atk-vin02a2:13: Yaṃ tassa dāni sampatto, yasmā saṃvaṇṇanākkamo;
atk-vin02a2:16: Te ce puna vadeyyāma, pariyosānaṃ kadā bhave.
atk-vin02a2:17: Uttānā ceva ye atthā, tesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya kiṃ;
atk-vin02a2:19: Anuttānā na te yasmā, sakkā ñātuṃ avaṇṇitā;
atk-vin02a2:21_0: 1. Tena samayena buddho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle
atk-vin02a2:21_1: paṭhamābhisambuddhoti ettha kiñcāpi “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāya”ntiādīsu
atk-vin02a2:21_2: viya karaṇavacane visesakāraṇaṃ natthi, vinayaṃ patvā pana karaṇavacaneneva ayamabhilāpo
atk-vin02a2:21_3: āropitoti ādito paṭṭhāya āruḷhābhilāpavasenevetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Esa nayo aññesupi
atk-vin02a2:22_0: Kiṃ panetassa vacane payojananti? Pabbajjādīnaṃ vinayakammānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya nidānadassanaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:22_1: Yā hi bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampada”nti
atk-vin02a2:22_2: evaṃ pabbajjā ceva upasampadā ca anuññātā, yāni ca rājagahādīsu upajjhāyaupajjhāyavattaācariyaācariyavattādīni
atk-vin02a2:22_3: anuññātāni, tāni abhisambodhiṃ patvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-vin02a2:22_4: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā iminā anukkamena idañcidañca ṭhānaṃ patvā imasmiñca imasmiñca
atk-vin02a2:22_5: vatthusmiṃ paññattānīti evametesaṃ pabbajjādīnaṃ vinayakammānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya nidānadassanaṃ
atk-vin02a2:23_0: Tattha uruvelāyanti mahāvelāyaṃ; mahante vālikarāsimhīti attho. Atha vā “urū”ti vālikā
atk-vin02a2:23_1: vuccati; “velā”ti mariyādā; velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evampettha attho
atk-vin02a2:23_2: daṭṭhabbo. Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassakulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-vin02a2:23_3: tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu – “kāyakammavacīkammāni
atk-vin02a2:23_4: nāma paresampi pākaṭāni honti, manokammaṃ pana apākaṭaṃ; tasmā yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā
atk-vin02a2:23_5: byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi, tassa añño codako nāma natthi, so
atk-vin02a2:23_6: attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālikaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu, idamassa
atk-vin02a2:23_7: daṇḍakamma”nti. Tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, so tattha pattapuṭena
atk-vin02a2:23_8: vālikaṃ ākirati. Evaṃ tattha anukkamena mahāvālikarāsi jāto, tato naṃ pacchimā janatā
atk-vin02a2:23_9: parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “uruvelāyanti mahāvelāyaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:23_10: mahante vālikarāsimhīti attho”ti. Tameva sandhāya vuttaṃ – “atha vā urūti vālikā
atk-vin02a2:23_11: vuccati; velāti mariyādā; velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-vin02a2:24_0: Bodhirukkhamūleti bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ; taṃ bodhiṃ bhagavā ettha pattoti
atk-vin02a2:24_1: rukkhopi “bodhirukkho”tveva nāmaṃ labhi, tassa bodhirukkhassa mūle bodhirukkhamūle.
atk-vin02a2:24_2: Paṭhamābhisambuddhoti paṭhamaṃ abhisambuddho; abhisambuddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃyevāti
atk-vin02a2:24_3: attho. Ekapallaṅkenāti sakimpi anuṭṭhahitvā yathāābhujitena ekeneva pallaṅkena. Vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-vin02a2:25_0: Paṭiccasamuppādanti paccayākāraṃ. Paccayākāro hi aññamaññaṃ paṭicca sahite dhamme
atk-vin02a2:25_1: uppādetīti “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vuccati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana sabbākārasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a2:25_2: vinicchayaṃ icchantena visuddhimaggato gahetabbo. Anulomapaṭilomanti anulomañca paṭilomañca.
atk-vin02a2:25_3: Tattha “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto avijjādiko paccayākāro attanā
atk-vin02a2:25_5: nayena vutto sveva anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamāno taṃ kiccaṃ na karotīti tassa akaraṇato
atk-vin02a2:25_6: “paṭilomo”ti vuccati. Purimanayena vā vutto pavattiyā anulomo, itaro tassā paṭilomoti
atk-vin02a2:25_7: evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ādito pana paṭṭhāya yāva antaṃ, antato ca paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-vin02a2:25_8: ādiṃ pāpetvā avuttattā ito aññenatthena anulomapaṭilomatā na yujjati.
atk-vin02a2:26_0: Manasākāsīti manasi akāsi. Tattha yathā anulomaṃ manasi akāsi, idaṃ tāva dassetuṃ
atk-vin02a2:26_1: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
atk-vin02a2:26_2: Tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a2:26_3: Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana sabbākārasampannaṃ vinicchayaṃ icchantena visuddhimaggatova gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:27_0: Yathā pana paṭilomaṃ manasi akāsi, idaṃ dassetuṃ avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā
atk-vin02a2:27_1: saṅkhāranirodhotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva. Asesavirāganirodhāti
atk-vin02a2:27_2: virāgasaṅkhātena maggena asesanirodhā. Saṅkhāranirodhoti saṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanirodho
atk-vin02a2:27_3: hoti. Evaṃ niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇaṃ niruddhaṃ, viññāṇādīnañca
atk-vin02a2:27_4: nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādīni
atk-vin02a2:27_5: vatvā evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha kevalassāti
atk-vin02a2:27_6: sakalassa; suddhassa vā sattavirahitassāti attho. Dukkhakkhandhassāti dukkharāsissa.
atk-vin02a2:28_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ “avijjādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo
atk-vin02a2:28_1: ca avijjānirodhādivasena ca nirodho hotī”ti vutto, sabbākārena etamatthaṃ viditvā.
atk-vin02a2:28_2: Tāyaṃ velāyanti tāyaṃ tassa atthassa viditavelāyaṃ. Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a2:28_3: vidite atthe hetuno ca hetusamuppannadhammassa ca pajānanāya ānubhāvadīpakaṃ “yadā
atk-vin02a2:28_4: have pātubhavantī”tiādikaṃ somanassayuttañāṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ udānaṃ udānesi, attamanavācaṃ
atk-vin02a2:29_0: Tassattho – yadā haveti yasmiṃ bhave kāle. Pātubhavantīti uppajjanti. Dhammāti anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasādhakā
atk-vin02a2:29_1: bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Atha vā pātubhavantīti pakāsanti; abhisamayavasena byattā pākaṭā
atk-vin02a2:29_2: honti. Dhammāti catuariyasaccadhammā. Ātāpo vuccati kilesasantāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:29_3: ātāpinoti sammappadhānavīriyavato. Jhāyatoti ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena ca lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena
atk-vin02a2:29_4: ca jhānena jhāyantassa. Brāhmaṇassāti bāhitapāpassa khīṇāsavassa. Athassa kaṅkhā
atk-vin02a2:29_5: vapayantīti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa kaṅkhā vapayanti. Sabbāti yā etā “ko
atk-vin02a2:29_6: nu kho bhante phusatīti; no kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā, tathā “katamaṃ nu
atk-vin02a2:29_7: kho bhante jarāmaraṇaṃ; kassa ca panidaṃ jarāmaraṇanti; no kallo pañhoti bhagavā
atk-vin02a2:29_8: avocā”tiādinā ca nayena paccayākāre kaṅkhā vuttā, yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā
atk-vin02a2:29_9: “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādikā soḷasa kaṅkhā āgatā, tā sabbā vapayanti
atk-vin02a2:29_10: apagacchanti nirujjhanti. Kasmā? Yato pajānāti sahetudhammanti yasmā avijjādikena
atk-vin02a2:29_11: hetunā sahetukaṃ imaṃ saṅkhārādiṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāti paṭivijjhatīti.
atk-vin02a2:30_0: 2. Dutiyavāre – imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ tasmiṃ vidite atthe “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā
atk-vin02a2:30_1: saṅkhāranirodho”ti evaṃ pakāsitassa nibbānasaṅkhātassa paccayakkhayassa avabodhānubhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:30_2: vuttappakāraṃ udānaṃ udānesīti attho. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yasmā paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin02a2:30_3: nibbānaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi, tasmā yadāssa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā
atk-vin02a2:30_4: dhammā pātubhavanti, athassa yā nibbānassa aviditattā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā sabbāpi kaṅkhā vapayantīti.
atk-vin02a2:31_0: 3. Tatiyavāre – imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ yena maggena so dukkhakkhandhassa samudayanirodhasaṅkhāto
atk-vin02a2:31_1: attho kiccavasena ca ārammaṇakiriyāya ca vidito, tassa ariyamaggassa ānubhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:31_2: vuttappakāraṃ udānaṃ udānesīti attho. Tatrāpāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yadā have pātubhavanti
atk-vin02a2:31_3: dhammā ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa, tadā so brāhmaṇo tehi vā uppannehi bodhipakkhiyadhammehi,
atk-vin02a2:31_4: yassa vā ariyamaggassa catusaccadhammā pātubhūtā, tena ariyamaggena vidhūpayaṃ tiṭṭhati
atk-vin02a2:31_5: mārasenaṃ “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenaṃ vidhūpayanto
atk-vin02a2:31_6: vidhamento viddhaṃsento tiṭṭhati. Kathaṃ? Sūriyova obhāsayamantalikkhaṃ, yathā sūriyo
atk-vin02a2:31_7: abbhuggato attano pabhāya antalikkhaṃ obhāsentova andhakāraṃ vidhamento tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a2:31_8: evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo tehi dhammehi tena vā maggena saccāni paṭivijjhantova mārasenaṃ
atk-vin02a2:32_0: Evamettha paṭhamaṃ udānaṃ paccayākārapaccavekkhaṇavasena, dutiyaṃ nibbānapaccavekkhaṇavasena,
atk-vin02a2:32_1: tatiyaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannanti veditabbaṃ. Udāne pana “rattiyā paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a2:32_2: yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomaṃ, dutiyaṃ yāmaṃ paṭilomaṃ, tatiyaṃ yāmaṃ anulomapaṭiloma”nti
atk-vin02a2:32_3: vuttaṃ; taṃ sattāhassa accayena “sve āsanā vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti rattiṃ uppāditamanasikāraṃ
atk-vin02a2:32_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadā hi bhagavā yassa paccayākārapajānanassa ca paccayakkhayādhigamassa
atk-vin02a2:32_5: ca ānubhāvadīpikā purimā dve udānagāthā, tassa vasena ekekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ paṭhamayāmañca
atk-vin02a2:32_6: majjhimayāmañca manasākāsi, idha pana pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ manasākāsi. Bhagavā hi
atk-vin02a2:32_7: visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussari, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ
atk-vin02a2:32_8: visodhesi, pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasi katvā “idāni aruṇo
atk-vin02a2:32_9: uggamissatī”ti sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Sabbaññutappattisamanantarameva ca aruṇo uggacchi.
atk-vin02a2:32_10: Tato taṃ divasaṃ teneva pallaṅkena vītināmetvā sampattāya pāṭipadarattiyā tīsu yāmesu
atk-vin02a2:32_11: evaṃ manasi katvā imāni udānāni udānesi. Iti pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ manasi katvā taṃ
atk-vin02a2:32_12: “bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdī”ti evaṃ vuttasattāhaṃ tattheva vītināmesi.
atk-vin02a2:35_0: 4. Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā bodhirukkhamūlā
atk-vin02a2:35_1: yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkamīti ettha na bhagavā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin02a2:35_2: anantarameva bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami. Yathā pana “bhutvā
atk-vin02a2:35_3: sayatī”ti vutte na “hatthe adhovitvā mukhaṃ avikkhāletvā sayanasamīpaṃ agantvā aññaṃ
atk-vin02a2:35_4: kiñci ālāpasallāpaṃ akatvā sayati”cceva vuttaṃ hoti, bhojanato pana pacchā sayati,
atk-vin02a2:35_5: na nasayatīti idamevattha dīpitaṃ hoti. Evamidhāpi “na tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin02a2:35_6: anantarameva pakkāmī”ti vuttaṃ hoti, vuṭṭhānato ca pana pacchā pakkāmi, na napakkāmīti
atk-vin02a2:36_0: Anantaraṃ pana apakkamitvā bhagavā kiṃ akāsīti? Aparānipi tīṇi sattāhāni bodhisamīpeyeva
atk-vin02a2:36_1: vītināmesi. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – bhagavati kira buddhattaṃ patvā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena
atk-vin02a2:36_2: nisinne “na bhagavā vuṭṭhāti; kiṃ nu kho aññepi buddhattakarā dhammā atthī”ti ekaccānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:36_3: devatānaṃ kaṅkhā udapādi. Atha bhagavā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:36_4: kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ
atk-vin02a2:36_5: kaṅkhaṃ vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā cattāri
atk-vin02a2:36_6: asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca upacitānaṃ pāramīnaṃ balādhigamanaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-vin02a2:36_7: bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ animisacetiyaṃ
atk-vin02a2:36_8: nāma jātaṃ. Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā puratthimato ca pacchimato
atk-vin02a2:36_9: ca āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanacaṅkamacetiyaṃ
atk-vin02a2:36_10: nāma jātaṃ. Tato pacchimadisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ māpayiṃsu. Tattha pallaṅkena
atk-vin02a2:36_11: nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayaṃ samantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto
atk-vin02a2:36_12: sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:37_0: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā
atk-vin02a2:37_1: yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami. Tassa kira nigrodhassa chāyāya ajapālakā gantvā
atk-vin02a2:37_2: nisīdanti; tenassa ajapālanigrodhotveva nāmaṃ udapādi. Sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-vin02a2:37_3: tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi. Bodhito puratthimadisābhāge
atk-vin02a2:37_4: esa rukkho hoti. Evaṃ nisinne ca panettha bhagavati eko brāhmaṇo gantvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-vin02a2:37_5: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho aññataro”tiādi. Tattha huṃhuṅkajātikoti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko
atk-vin02a2:37_6: nāma, mānavasena kodhavasena ca “huṃhu”nti karonto vicarati, tasmā “huṃhuṅkajātiko”ti
atk-vin02a2:38_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tena vuttassa vacanassa sikhāpattamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ
atk-vin02a2:38_1: velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Tassattho – yo bāhitapāpadhammatāya brāhmaṇo na diṭṭhamaṅgalikatāya,
atk-vin02a2:38_2: huṃhuṅkārakabhāvādipāpadhammayutto hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattakena brahmaññaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-vin02a2:38_3: so brāhmaṇo bāhitapāpadhammattā huṃhuṅkārappahānena nihuṃhuṅko, rāgādikasāvābhāvena
atk-vin02a2:38_4: nikkasāvo, bhāvanānuyogayuttacittatāya yatatto, sīlasaṃvarena vā saññatacittatāya
atk-vin02a2:38_5: yatatto, catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātehi vedehi antaṃ, vedānaṃ vā antaṃ gatattā vedantagū,
atk-vin02a2:38_6: maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā vusitabrahmacariyo. Dhammena brahmavādaṃ vadeyya,
atk-vin02a2:38_7: “brāhmaṇo, aha”nti etaṃ vādaṃ dhammena vadeyya, yassa sakale lokasannivāse kuhiñci
atk-vin02a2:38_8: ekārammaṇepi rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussadoti ime ussadā natthīti.
atk-vin02a2:41_0: 5. Akālameghoti asampatte vassakāle uppannamegho. Ayaṃ pana gimhānaṃ pacchime māse
atk-vin02a2:41_1: udapādi. Sattāhavaddalikāti tasmiṃ uppanne sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosi. Sītavātaduddinīti
atk-vin02a2:41_2: sā ca pana sattāhavaddalikā udakaphusitasammissena sītavātena samantā paribbhamantena
atk-vin02a2:41_3: dūsitadivasattā sītavātaduddinī nāma ahosi. Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājāti tasseva
atk-vin02a2:41_4: mucalindarukkhassa samīpe pokkharaṇiyā nibbatto mahānubhāvo nāgarājā. Sattakkhattuṃ
atk-vin02a2:41_5: bhogehi parikkhipitvāti evaṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a2:41_6: karitvāva ṭhite; tasmiṃ tassa parikkhepabbhantaraṃ lohapāsāde bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇaṃ
atk-vin02a2:41_7: ahosi, tasmā bhagavā nivāte pihitadvāravātapāne kūṭāgāre nisinno viya jāto. Mā bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin02a2:41_8: sītantiādi tassa tathā karitvā ṭhānakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ. So hi “mā bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ
atk-vin02a2:41_9: bādhayittha, mā uṇhaṃ, mā ḍaṃsādisamphasso bādhayitthā”ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a2:41_10: Tattha kiñcāpi sattāhavaddalikāya uṇhameva natthi, sace pana antarantarā megho vigaccheyya
atk-vin02a2:41_11: uṇhaṃ bhaveyya, tampi naṃ mā bādhayitthāti evaṃ tassa cintetuṃ yuttaṃ. Viddhanti
atk-vin02a2:41_12: ubbiddhaṃ; meghavigamena dūrībhūtanti attho. Vigatavalāhakanti apagatameghaṃ. Devanti
atk-vin02a2:42_0: Sukho vivekoti nibbānasaṅkhāto upadhiviveko sukho. Tuṭṭhassāti catumaggañāṇasantosena
atk-vin02a2:42_1: santuṭṭhassa. Sutadhammassāti pakāsitadhammassa. Passatoti taṃ vivekaṃ yaṃ vā kiñci
atk-vin02a2:42_2: passitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ attano vīriyabalādhigatena ñāṇacakkhunā passantassa.
atk-vin02a2:42_3: Abyāpajjanti akuppanabhāvo; etena mettāpubbabhāgo dassito. Pāṇabhūtesu saṃyamoti
atk-vin02a2:42_4: sattesu ca saṃyamo; avihiṃsanabhāvo sukhoti attho. Etena karuṇāpubbabhāgo dassito.
atk-vin02a2:42_5: Sukhā virāgatā loketi vītarāgatāpi sukhāti dīpeti. Kāmānaṃ samatikkamoti yā “kāmānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:42_6: samatikkamo”ti vuccati; sā virāgatāpi sukhāti attho. Etena anāgāmimaggo kathito.
atk-vin02a2:42_7: Asmimānassa yo vinayoti iminā pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ; arahattañhi asmimānassa “passaddhivinayo”ti
atk-vin02a2:42_8: vuccati. Ito parañca sukhaṃ nāma natthi, tenāha “etaṃ ve paramaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-vin02a2:45_1: dakkhiṇadisābhāge ṭhitaṃ rājāyatanarukkhaṃ upasaṅkami. Tena kho pana samayenāti katarena
atk-vin02a2:45_2: samayena. Bhagavato kira rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa samādhito
atk-vin02a2:45_4: devarājā osadhaharītakaṃ upanesi. Bhagavā taṃ paribhuñji, paribhuttamattasseva sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a2:45_5: ahosi. Sakko mukhodakaṃ adāsi. Bhagavā mukhaṃ dhovitvā tasmiṃyeva rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:46_0: Tena kho pana samayena tapussabhallikā vāṇijāti tapusso ca bhalliko cāti dve bhātaro
atk-vin02a2:46_1: vāṇijā. Ukkalāti ukkalajanapadato. Taṃ desanti yasmiṃ dese bhagavā viharati. Katarasmiñca
atk-vin02a2:46_2: dese bhagavā viharati? Majjhimadese. Tasmā majjhimadesaṃ gantuṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā
atk-vin02a2:46_3: hontīti ayamettha attho. Ñātisālohitā devatāti tesaṃ ñātibhūtapubbā devatā. Etadavocāti
atk-vin02a2:46_4: sā kira nesaṃ sabbasakaṭāni appavattīni akāsi. Tato te kiṃ idanti maggadevatānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:46_5: baliṃ akaṃsu. Tesaṃ balikammakāle sā devatā dissamāneneva kāyena etaṃ avoca. Manthena
atk-vin02a2:46_6: ca madhupiṇḍikāya cāti abaddhasattunā ca sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi yojetvā baddhasattunā
atk-vin02a2:46_7: ca. Patimānethāti upaṭṭhahatha. Taṃ voti taṃ patimānanaṃ tumhākaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ
atk-vin02a2:46_8: hitāya sukhāya. Yaṃ amhākanti yaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ amhākaṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
atk-vin02a2:46_9: Bhagavato etadahosīti yo kirassa padhānānuyogakāle patto ahosi, so sujātāya pāyāsaṃ
atk-vin02a2:46_10: dātuṃ āgacchantiyā eva antaradhāyi. Tenassa etadahosi – “patto me natthi, purimakāpi
atk-vin02a2:46_11: ca na kho tathāgatā hatthesu paṭiggaṇhanti, kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṭiggaṇheyyaṃ manthañca madhupiṇḍakañcā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:47_0: Parivitakkamaññāyāti ito pubbeva bhagavato sujātāya dinnabhojanaṃyeva ojānuppabandhanavasena
atk-vin02a2:47_1: aṭṭhāsi, ettakaṃ kālaṃ neva jighacchā na pipāsā na kāyadubbalyaṃ ahosi. Idāni panassa
atk-vin02a2:47_2: āhāraṃ paṭiggahetukāmatāya “na kho tathāgatā”tiādinā nayena parivitakko udapādi.
atk-vin02a2:47_3: Taṃ evaṃ uppannaṃ attano cetasā bhagavato cetoparivitakkamaññāya. Catuddisāti catūhi
atk-vin02a2:47_4: disāhi. Selamaye patteti muggavaṇṇaselamaye patte. Idaṃyeva bhagavā paṭiggahesi,
atk-vin02a2:47_5: teyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cattāro pana mahārājāno paṭhamaṃ indanīlamaṇimaye patte upanāmesuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:47_6: na te bhagavā aggahesi. Tato ime cattāropi muggavaṇṇasilāmaye patte upanāmesuṃ, bhagavā
atk-vin02a2:47_7: cattāropi patte aggahesi tesaṃ pasādānurakkhaṇatthāya, no mahicchatāya. Gahetvā ca
atk-vin02a2:47_8: pana cattāropi yathā ekova patto hoti tathā adhiṭṭhahi, catunnampi ekasadiso puññavipāko
atk-vin02a2:47_9: ahosi. Evaṃ ekaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhite paṭiggahesi bhagavā paccagghe selamaye patte manthañca
atk-vin02a2:47_10: madhupiṇḍikañca. Paccaggheti paccagghasmiṃ; pāṭekkaṃ mahagghasminti attho. Atha vā
atk-vin02a2:47_11: paccaggheti abhinave abbhuṇhe; taṅkhaṇe nibbattasminti attho. Dve vācā etesaṃ ahesunti
atk-vin02a2:47_12: dvevācikā. Atha vā dvīhi vācāhi upāsakabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Te evaṃ upāsakabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a2:47_13: paṭivedetvā bhagavantaṃ āhaṃsu – “kassa dāni bhante amhehi ajja paṭṭhāya abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:47_14: kātabba”nti? Atha bhagavā sīsaṃ parāmasi, kesā hatthe laggiṃsu. Te tesaṃ adāsi “ime
atk-vin02a2:47_15: tumhe pariharathā”ti. Te kesadhātuyo labhitvā amateneva abhisittā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin02a2:50_0: 7. Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā vuttappakārametaṃ
atk-vin02a2:50_1: sabbaṃ kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā rājāyatanamūlā punapi yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami.
atk-vin02a2:50_2: Parivitakko udapādīti tasmiṃ nisinnamattasseva sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo ayaṃ
atk-vin02a2:50_3: cetaso parivitakko udapādi. Kasmā panāyaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ uppajjatīti? Dhammassa mahantabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a2:50_4: garubhāvaṃ bhāriyabhāvaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāya ca. Jānanti
atk-vin02a2:50_5: hi buddhā “evaṃ parivitakkite brahmā āgantvā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati, tato sattā
atk-vin02a2:50_6: dhamme gāravaṃ uppādessanti, brahmagaruko hi lokasannivāso”ti. Iti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi
atk-vin02a2:51_0: Tattha adhigato kho myāyanti adhigato kho me ayaṃ. Ālayarāmāti sattā pañca kāmaguṇe
atk-vin02a2:51_1: allīyanti, tasmā te “ālayā”ti vuccanti. Tehi ālayehi ramantīti ālayarāmā. Ālayesu
atk-vin02a2:51_2: ratāti ālayaratā. Ālayesu suṭṭhumuditāti ālayasammuditā. Yadidanti nipāto. Tassa
atk-vin02a2:51_3: ṭhānaṃ sandhāya “yaṃ ida”nti paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sandhāya “yo aya”nti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:51_4: Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādoti imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, idappaccayāva idappaccayatā,
atk-vin02a2:51_5: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo. So mamassa
atk-vin02a2:51_6: kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assa; sā mama vihesā assāti
atk-vin02a2:51_7: attho. Bhagavantanti bhagavato. Anacchariyāti anu acchariyā. Paṭibhaṃsūti paṭibhānasaṅkhātassa
atk-vin02a2:52_0: Halanti ettha hakāro nipātamatto; alanti attho. Pakāsitunti desituṃ. Alaṃ dāni me
atk-vin02a2:52_1: imaṃ kicchena adhigataṃ dhammaṃ desetunti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭisotagāminti paṭisotaṃ
atk-vin02a2:52_2: vuccati nibbānaṃ; nibbānagāminti attho. Rāgarattāti kāmarāgabhavarāgadiṭṭhirāgena
atk-vin02a2:52_3: rattā. Na dakkhantīti na passissanti. Tamokhandhena āvuṭāti avijjārāsinā ajjhotthaṭā.
atk-vin02a2:53_0: 8. Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke. Bhagavato purato pāturahosīti dhammadesanāyācanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a2:53_1: dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu mahābrahmāno gahetvā āgamma bhagavato purato pāturahosi.
atk-vin02a2:53_2: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvāti
atk-vin02a2:54_0: Pāturahosīti pātubhavi. Samalehi cintitoti rāgādīhi malehi samalehi chahi satthārehi
atk-vin02a2:54_1: cintito. Apāpuretanti vivara etaṃ. Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ
atk-vin02a2:54_2: ariyamaggaṃ. Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato
atk-vin02a2:55_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova
atk-vin02a2:55_1: yathā cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya, tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-vin02a2:55_2: samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a2:56_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati. Vīrātiādīsu
atk-vin02a2:56_1: bhagavā vīriyavantatāya vīro. Devaputtamaccukilesābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ vijitattā vijitasaṅgāmo.
atk-vin02a2:57_0: 9. Ajjhesananti yācanaṃ. Buddhacakkhunāti indriyaparopariyattañāṇena ca āsayānusayañāṇena
atk-vin02a2:57_1: ca. Imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti nāmaṃ. Apparajakkhāti paññācakkhumhi
atk-vin02a2:57_2: rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ yesaṃ, te apparajakkhā. Yesaṃ taṃ mahantaṃ te mahārajakkhā. Yesaṃ
atk-vin02a2:57_3: saddhādīni indriyāni tikkhāni te tikkhindriyā. Yesaṃ tāni mudūni te mudindriyā. Yesaṃ
atk-vin02a2:57_4: teyeva saddhādayo ākārā sundarā te svākārā. Yesaṃ teyeva saddhādayo ākārā asundarā
atk-vin02a2:57_5: te dvākārā. Ye kathitakāraṇaṃ sallakkhenti, sukhena sakkā honti viññāpetuṃ te suviññāpayā.
atk-vin02a2:57_6: Ye paralokañca vajjañca bhayato passanti te paralokavajjabhayadassāvino. Uppaliniyanti
atk-vin02a2:57_7: uppalavane. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Antonimuggaposīnīti yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva
atk-vin02a2:57_8: posayanti. Samodakaṃ ṭhitānīti udakena samaṃ ṭhitāni. Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānīti
atk-vin02a2:58_0: Apārutāti vivaṭā. Amatassa dvārāti ariyamaggo. So hi amatasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa
atk-vin02a2:58_1: dvāraṃ. Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu. Pacchimapadadvaye ayamattho,
atk-vin02a2:58_2: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattimpi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī
atk-vin02a2:61_0: 10. Paṇḍitoti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Byattoti veyyattiyena samannāgato. Medhāvīti
atk-vin02a2:61_1: ṭhānuppattiyā paññāya samannāgato. Apparajakkhajātikoti samāpattiyā vikkhambhitattā
atk-vin02a2:61_2: nikkilesajātiko visuddhasatto. Ājānissatīti sallakkhessati paṭivijjhissati. Bhagavatopi
atk-vin02a2:61_3: kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uppajji “ito sattamadivasamatthake kālaṃkatvā
atk-vin02a2:61_5: parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti mahājāniyo akkhaṇe nibbattattā. Abhidosakālaṃkatoti
atk-vin02a2:61_6: hiyyo kālaṃkato, sopi nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbattoti addasa. Bahūkārāti bahūpakārā.
atk-vin02a2:61_7: Padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ mukhodakadānādinā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:62: 11. Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti upako bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa. Addhānamaggappaṭipannanti addhānamaggaṃ paṭipannaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:63_0: Sabbābhibhūti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Sabbavidūti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ
atk-vin02a2:63_1: avediṃ aññāsiṃ. Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu kilesalepena
atk-vin02a2:63_2: alitto. Sabbañjahoti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito. Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti
atk-vin02a2:63_3: taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto. Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ
atk-vin02a2:63_4: attanāva jānitvā. Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:64_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi. Natthi me paṭipuggaloti
atk-vin02a2:64_1: mayhaṃ paṭibhāgapuggalo nāma natthi. Sītibhūtoti sabbakilesagginibbāpanena sītibhūto.
atk-vin02a2:65: Kāsīnaṃ puranti kāsiraṭṭhe nagaraṃ. Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkappaṭilābhāya amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmi.
atk-vin02a2:66: Arahasi anantajinoti anantajino bhavituṃ yutto. Hupeyyapāvusoti āvuso evampi nāma bhaveyya. Sīsaṃ okampetvāti sīsaṃ cāletvā.
atk-vin02a2:67_0: 12. Saṇṭhapesunti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Bāhullikoti cīvarabāhullādīnaṃ atthāya paṭipanno.
atk-vin02a2:67_1: Padhānavibbhantoti padhānato vibbhanto bhaṭṭho parihīno. Āvatto bāhullāyāti cīvarādibahulabhāvatthāya
atk-vin02a2:67_2: āvatto. Odahatha bhikkhave sotanti upanetha bhikkhave sotaṃ; sotindriyaṃ dhammasavanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a2:67_3: abhimukhaṃ karothāti attho. Amatamadhigatanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ mayā adhigatanti dasseti.
atk-vin02a2:67_4: Iriyāyāti dukkarairiyāya. Paṭipadāyāti dukkarapaṭipadāya. Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha
atk-vin02a2:67_5: nu me samanupassatha. Evarūpaṃ bhāsitametanti etaṃ evarūpaṃ vākyaṃ bhāsitanti attho.
atk-vin02a2:67_6: Asakkhi kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū saññāpetunti “ahaṃ buddho”ti jānāpetuṃ asakkhi.
atk-vin02a2:68_0: 13. Cakkhukaraṇīti paññācakkhuṃ sandhāyāha. Ito paraṃ sabbaṃ padatthato uttānameva.
atk-vin02a2:68_2: veditabbaṃ. Ito paṭṭhāya hi ativitthārabhīrukassa mahājanassa cittaṃ anurakkhantā
atk-vin02a2:69_0: 18. Sāva tassa āyasmato upasampadā ahosīti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāya aṭṭhārasahi devatākoṭīhi
atk-vin02a2:69_1: saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitassa “ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavato vacanena abhinipphannā
atk-vin02a2:70_0: 19. Atha kho āyasmato ca vappassāti ādimhi vappattherassa pāṭipadadivase dhammacakkhuṃ
atk-vin02a2:70_1: udapādi, bhaddiyattherassa dutiyadivase, mahānāmattherassa tatiyadivase, assajittherassa
atk-vin02a2:70_2: catutthiyanti. Imesañca pana bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānesu uppannamalavisodhanatthaṃ bhagavā
atk-vin02a2:70_3: antovihāreyeva ahosi. Uppanne uppanne kammaṭṭhānamale ākāsena gantvā malaṃ vinodesi.
atk-vin02a2:70_4: Pakkhassa pana pañcamiyaṃ sabbe te ekato sannipātetvā anattasuttena ovadi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a2:71: 24. Tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto hontīti pañcamiyā pakkhassa lokasmiṃ cha manussā arahanto hontīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:74_0: 31. Pubbānupubbakānanti paveṇivasena porāṇānuporāṇānanti attho. Tena kho pana samayena
atk-vin02a2:74_1: ekasaṭṭhi loke arahanto hontīti purimā cha ime ca pañcapaññāsāti antovassamhiyeva
atk-vin02a2:75_0: Tatra yasaādīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ ayaṃ pubbayogo – atīte kira pañcapaññāsajanā sahāyakā
atk-vin02a2:75_1: vaggabandhena puññāni karontā anāthasarīrāni paṭijaggantā vicaranti, te ekadivasaṃ
atk-vin02a2:75_2: gabbhiniṃ itthiṃ kālaṃkataṃ disvā “jhāpessāmā”ti susānaṃ nīhariṃsu. Tesu pañca jane
atk-vin02a2:75_3: “tumhe jhāpethā”ti susāne ṭhapetvā sesā gāmaṃ paviṭṭhā. Yaso dārako taṃ sarīraṃ vijjhitvā
atk-vin02a2:75_4: parivattetvā ca jhāpayamāno asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhi. So itaresampi catunnaṃ janānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:75_5: “passatha bho imaṃ asuciṃ paṭikūla”nti dassesi. Tepi tattha asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:75_6: Te pañcapi janā gāmaṃ gantvā sesasahāyakānaṃ kathayiṃsu. Yaso pana dārako gehampi
atk-vin02a2:75_7: gantvā mātāpitūnnañca bhariyāya ca kathesi. Te sabbepi asubhaṃ bhāvayiṃsu. Ayametesaṃ
atk-vin02a2:75_8: pubbayogo. Tenāyasmato yasassa nāṭakajanesu susānasaññāyeva uppajji, tāyeva ca upanissayasampattiyā

atk-vin02a2:80_0: Evaṃ pabbajjādosavirahitaṃ mātāpitūhi anuññātaṃ pabbājentenāpi ca sace acchinnakeso
atk-vin02a2:80_1: hoti, ekasīmāya ca aññepi bhikkhū atthi, kesacchedanatthāya bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:80_2: Tassa āpucchanākāraṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghaṃ apaloketuṃ bhaṇḍukammāyā”ti ettha
atk-vin02a2:80_3: vaṇṇayissāma. Sace okāso hoti, sayaṃ pabbājetabbo. Sace uddesaparipucchādīhi byāvaṭo
atk-vin02a2:80_4: hoti, okāsaṃ na labhati, eko daharabhikkhu vattabbo “etaṃ pabbājehī”ti. Avuttopi
atk-vin02a2:80_5: ce daharabhikkhu upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājeti, vaṭṭati. Sace daharabhikkhu natthi,
atk-vin02a2:80_6: sāmaṇeropi vattabbo “etaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvā pabbājetvā kāsāyāni acchādetvā ehī”ti.
atk-vin02a2:80_7: Saraṇāni pana sayaṃ dātabbāni. Evaṃ bhikkhunāva pabbajito hoti. Purisañhi bhikkhuto
atk-vin02a2:80_8: añño pabbājetuṃ na labhati, mātugāmaṃ bhikkhunito añño. Sāmaṇero pana sāmaṇerī vā

atk-vin02a2:81_0: Sace pana bhabbarūpo hoti sahetuko ñāto yasassī kulaputto, okāsaṃ katvāpi sayameva
atk-vin02a2:81_1: pabbājetabbo. “Mattikāmuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā nhāyitvā kese temetvā āgacchāhī”ti ca pana
atk-vin02a2:81_2: na vissajjetabbo. Pabbajitukāmānañhi paṭhamaṃ balavaussāho hoti, pacchā pana kāsāyāni
atk-vin02a2:81_3: ca kesaharaṇasatthakañca disvā utrasanti, ettoyeva palāyanti, tasmā sayameva nahānatitthaṃ
atk-vin02a2:81_4: netvā sace nātidaharo hoti, “nahāhī”ti vattabbo. Kesā panassa sayameva mattikaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a2:81_5: dhovitabbā. Daharakumārako pana sayaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā gomayamattikāhi ghaṃsitvā nahāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:81_6: Sacepissa kacchu vā piḷakā vā honti, yathā mātā puttaṃ na jigucchati, evameva ajigucchantena
atk-vin02a2:81_7: sādhukaṃ hatthapādasīsāni ghaṃsitvā nahāpetabbo. Kasmā? Ettakena hi upakārena kulaputtā
atk-vin02a2:81_8: ācariyupajjhāyesu ca sāsane ca balavasinehā tibbagāravā anivattidhammā honti, uppannaṃ
atk-vin02a2:81_9: anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā therabhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti, kataññū katavedino honti.
atk-vin02a2:82_0: Evaṃ nahāpanakāle pana kesamassuṃ oropanakāle vā “tvaṃ ñāto yasassī, idāni mayaṃ
atk-vin02a2:82_1: taṃ nissāya paccayehi na kilamissāmā”ti na vattabbo, aññāpi aniyyānikakathā na kathetabbā.
atk-vin02a2:82_2: Atha khvassa “āvuso, suṭṭhu upadhārehi satiṃ upaṭṭhāpehī”ti vatvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:82_4: nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontena ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace hi so pubbe madditasaṅkhāro
atk-vin02a2:82_5: hoti bhāvitabhāvano, kaṇṭakavedhāpekkho viya paripakkagaṇḍo, sūriyuggamanāpekkhaṃ
atk-vin02a2:82_6: viya ca pariṇatapadumaṃ, athassa āraddhamatte kammaṭṭhānamanasikāre indāsani viya
atk-vin02a2:82_7: pabbate kilesapabbate cuṇṇayamānaṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattati, khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin02a2:82_8: Ye hi keci khuragge arahattaṃ pattā, sabbe te evarūpaṃ savanaṃ labhitvā kalyāṇamittena
atk-vin02a2:82_9: ācariyena dinnanayaṃ nissāya no anissāya. Tasmāssa āditova evarūpī kathā kathetabbāti.
atk-vin02a2:83_0: Kesesu pana oropitesu haliddicuṇṇena vā gandhacuṇṇena vā sīsañca sarīrañca ubbaṭṭetvā
atk-vin02a2:83_1: gihigandhaṃ apanetvā kāsāyāni tikkhattuṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā sakiṃ vā paṭiggāhetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:83_2: Athāpissa hatthe adatvā ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā sayameva acchādeti, vaṭṭati. Sacepi
atk-vin02a2:83_3: aññaṃ daharaṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā āṇāpeti “āvuso, etāni kāsāyāni gahetvā
atk-vin02a2:83_4: etaṃ acchādehī”ti taṃyeva vā āṇāpeti “etāni gahetvā acchādehī”ti sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:84_0: Yaṃ pana nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vā anāṇattiyā nivāseti vā pārupati vā, taṃ apanetvā
atk-vin02a2:84_1: puna dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhunā hi sahatthena vā āṇattiyā vā dinnameva kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a2:84_2: adinnaṃ na vaṭṭati, sacepi tasseva santakaṃ hoti, ko pana vādo upajjhāyamūlake! Ayaṃ
atk-vin02a2:84_3: “paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
atk-vin02a2:85_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvāti ye tattha sannipatitā bhikkhū, tesaṃ pāde vandāpetvā;
atk-vin02a2:85_1: atha saraṇaggahaṇatthaṃ ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā evaṃ vadehīti
atk-vin02a2:85_2: vattabbo. “Yamahaṃ vadāmi, taṃ vadehī”ti vattabbo. Athassa upajjhāyena vā ācariyena

atk-vin02a2:85_5: vā tikkhattuṃ datvā puna itaresu ekekaṃ tikkhattuṃ deti, adinnāni honti saraṇāni.
atk-vin02a2:86_0: Imañca pana saraṇagamanūpasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā anuññātaupasampadā ekato suddhiyā
atk-vin02a2:86_1: vaṭṭati. Sāmaṇerapabbajjā pana ubhatosuddhiyāva vaṭṭati, no ekato suddhiyā. Tasmā
atk-vin02a2:86_2: upasampadāya sace ācariyo ñattidosañceva kammavācādosañca vajjetvā kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a2:86_3: sukataṃ hoti. Pabbajjāya pana imāni tīṇi saraṇāni bukāradhakārādīnaṃ byañjanānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:86_4: ṭhānakaraṇasampadaṃ ahāpenteneva ācariyenapi antevāsikenapi vattabbāni. Sace ācariyo
atk-vin02a2:86_5: vattuṃ sakkoti, antevāsiko na sakkoti; antevāsiko vā sakkoti, ācariyo na sakkoti;
atk-vin02a2:86_6: ubhopi vā na sakkonti, na vaṭṭati. Sace pana ubhopi sakkonti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:87_0: Imāni ca pana dadamānena “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti evaṃ ekasambandhāni anunāsikantāni
atk-vin02a2:87_1: vā katvā dātabbāni, “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti evaṃ vicchinditvā makārantāni vā
atk-vin02a2:87_2: katvā dātabbāni. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ nāmaṃ sāvetvā “ahaṃ bhante buddharakkhito yāvajīvaṃ

atk-vin02a2:88_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampadanti imehi buddhaṃ

atk-vin02a2:119_0: 60. Sāriputtamoggallānāti sāriputto ca moggallāno ca. Tehi katikā katā hoti “yo paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a2:119_1: amataṃ adhigacchati, so ārocetū”ti te kira ubhopi gihikāle upatisso kolitoti evaṃ
atk-vin02a2:119_2: paññāyamānanāmā aḍḍhateyyasatamāṇavakaparivārā giraggasamajjaṃ agamaṃsu. Tatra nesaṃ
atk-vin02a2:119_3: mahājanaṃ disvā etadahosi – “ayaṃ nāma evaṃ mahāsattanikāyo appatte vassasate maraṇamukhe
atk-vin02a2:119_4: patissatī”ti. Atha ubhopi uṭṭhitāya parisāya aññamaññaṃ pucchitvā ekajjhāsayā paccupaṭṭhitamaraṇasaññā
atk-vin02a2:119_5: sammantayiṃsu “samma maraṇe sati amatenāpi bhavitabbaṃ, handa mayaṃ amataṃ pariyesāmā”ti
atk-vin02a2:119_6: amatapariyesanatthaṃ sañcayassa channaparibbājakassa santike saparisā pabbajitvā
atk-vin02a2:119_7: katipāheneva tassa ñāṇavisaye pāraṃ gantvā amataṃ apassantā pucchiṃsu “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-vin02a2:119_8: ācariya, aññopettha sāro atthī”ti? “Natthāvuso, ettakameva ida”nti ca sutvā “tucchaṃ
atk-vin02a2:119_9: idaṃ āvuso nissāraṃ, yo dāni amhesu paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati, so itarassa ārocetū”ti
atk-vin02a2:119_10: katikaṃ akaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “tehi katikā katā hotī”tiādi.
atk-vin02a2:120_0: Pāsādikena abhikkantenātiādīsu itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atthikehi
atk-vin02a2:120_1: upaññātaṃ magganti etaṃ anubandhanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ; idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-vin02a2:120_2: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ, kasmā? Yasmā idaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito
atk-vin02a2:120_3: anubandhanaṃ nāma atthikehi upaññātaṃ maggaṃ ñāto ceva upagato ca maggo”ti attho.
atk-vin02a2:120_4: Atha vā atthikehi amhehi “maraṇe sati amatenāpi bhavitabba”nti evaṃ kevalaṃ atthīti
atk-vin02a2:120_5: upaññātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma, taṃ magganto pariyesantoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:121_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya paṭikkamīti sudinnakaṇḍe vuttappakāraṃ aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-vin02a2:121_1: nisīdi. Sāriputtopi kho “akālo kho tāva pañhaṃ pucchitu”nti kālaṃ āgamayamāno ekamantaṃ
atk-vin02a2:121_2: ṭhatvā vattapaṭipattipūraṇatthaṃ katabhattakiccassa therassa attano kamaṇḍaluto udakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:121_3: datvā dhotahatthapādena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a2:121_4: – “atha kho sāriputto paribbājako”tiādi. Na tāhaṃ sakkomīti na te ahaṃ sakkomi. Ettha
atk-vin02a2:121_5: ca paṭisambhidāppatto thero na ettakaṃ na sakkoti. Atha kho imassa dhammagāravaṃ
atk-vin02a2:121_6: uppādessāmīti sabbākārena buddhavisaye avisayabhāvaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-vin02a2:122_0: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavāti hetuppabhavā nāma pañcakkhandhā; tenassa dukkhasaccaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin02a2:122_1: Tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āhāti tesaṃ hetu nāma samudayasaccaṃ; tañca tathāgato āhāti
atk-vin02a2:122_2: dasseti. Tesañca yo nirodhoti tesaṃ ubhinnampi saccānaṃ yo appavattinirodho; tañca
atk-vin02a2:122_3: tathāgato āhāti attho. Tenassa nirodhasaccaṃ dasseti. Maggasaccaṃ panettha sarūpato
atk-vin02a2:122_4: adassitampi nayato dassitaṃ hoti, nirodhe hi vutte tassa sampāpako maggo vuttova
atk-vin02a2:122_5: hoti. Atha vā tesañca yo nirodhoti ettha tesaṃ yo nirodho ca nirodhupāyo cāti evaṃ
atk-vin02a2:122_6: dvepi saccāni dassitāni hontīti. Idāni tamevatthaṃ paṭipādento āha – “evaṃvādī mahāsamaṇo”ti.
atk-vin02a2:123_0: Eseva dhammo yadi tāvadevāti sacepi ito uttari natthi, ettakameva idaṃ sotāpattiphalamattameva
atk-vin02a2:123_1: pattabbaṃ, tathāpi eso eva dhammoti attho. Paccabyattha padamasokanti yaṃ mayaṃ pariyesamānā
atk-vin02a2:123_2: vicarāma, taṃ padamasokaṃ paṭividdhāttha tumhe; pattaṃ taṃ tumhehīti attho. Adiṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a2:123_3: abbhatītaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehīti amhehi nāma idaṃ padaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehi
atk-vin02a2:123_4: adiṭṭhameva abbhatītaṃ; iti tassa padassa adiṭṭhabhāvena dīgharattaṃ attano mahājānibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-vin02a2:124_0: 62. Gambhīre ñāṇavisayeti gambhīre ceva gambhīrassa ca ñāṇassa visayabhūte. Anuttare
atk-vin02a2:124_1: upadhisaṅkhayeti nibbāne. Vimutteti tadārammaṇāya vimuttiyā vimutte. Byākāsīti “etaṃ
atk-vin02a2:124_2: me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti vadanto sāvakapāramiññāṇe byākāsi.
atk-vin02a2:124_3: Sāva tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ upasampadā ahosīti sā ehibhikkhūpasampadāyeva tesaṃ upasampadā
atk-vin02a2:124_4: ahosi. Evaṃ upasampannesu ca tesu mahāmoggallānatthero sattahi divasehi arahatte
atk-vin02a2:125_0: Atīte kira anomadassī nāma buddho loke udapādi. Tassa sarado nāma tāpaso sake assame
atk-vin02a2:125_1: nānāpupphehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā pupphāsaneyeva bhagavantaṃ nisīdāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghassāpi
atk-vin02a2:125_2: tatheva maṇḍapaṃ katvā pupphāsanāni paññapetvā aggasāvakabhāvaṃ patthesi. Patthayitvā
atk-vin02a2:125_3: ca sirīvaḍḍhassa nāma seṭṭhino pesesi “mayā aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, tvampi āgantvā
atk-vin02a2:125_4: ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthehī”ti. Seṭṭhi nīluppalamaṇḍapaṃ katvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:125_5: tattha bhojetvā dutiyasāvakabhāvaṃ patthesi. Tesu saradatāpaso sāriputtatthero jāto,
atk-vin02a2:126_0: 63. Aputtakatāyātiādīsu yesaṃ puttā pabbajanti, tesaṃ aputtakatāya. Yāsaṃ patī pabbajanti,
atk-vin02a2:126_1: tāsaṃ vedhabyāya vidhavābhāvāya. Ubhayenāpi kulupacchedāya. Sañcayānīti sañcayassa
atk-vin02a2:126_2: antevāsikāni. Magadhānaṃ giribbajanti magadhānaṃ janapadassa giribbajaṃ nagaraṃ.
atk-vin02a2:126_3: Mahāvīrāti mahāvīriyavanto. Nayamānānanti nayamānesu. Bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ, upayogatthe
atk-vin02a2:126_4: vā. Kā usūyā vijānatanti dhammena nayantīti evaṃ vijānantānaṃ kā issā.
atk-vin02a2:129_0: 64-5. Anupajjhāyakāti vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyakena garunā virahitā. Anākappasampannāti
atk-vin02a2:129_1: na ākappena sampannā; samaṇasāruppācāravirahitāti attho. Uparibhojaneti bhojanassa
atk-vin02a2:129_2: upari. Uttiṭṭhapattanti piṇḍāya caraṇakapattaṃ. Tasmiñhi manussā ucchiṭṭhasaññino,
atk-vin02a2:129_3: tasmā uttiṭṭhapattanti vuttaṃ. Atha vā uṭṭhahitvā pattaṃ upanāmentīti evampettha
atk-vin02a2:129_4: attho daṭṭhabbo. Anujānāmi bhikkhave upajjhāyanti upajjhāyaṃ gahetuṃ anujānāmīti
atk-vin02a2:129_5: attho. Puttacittaṃ upaṭṭhapessatīti putto me ayanti evaṃ gehassitapemavasena cittaṃ
atk-vin02a2:129_6: upaṭṭhapessati. Esa nayo dutiyapadepi. Sagāravā sappatissāti garubhāvañceva jeṭṭhakabhāvañca
atk-vin02a2:129_7: upaṭṭhapetvā. Sabhāgavuttinoti sabhāgajīvikā. Sāhūti vātiādīni pañca padāni upajjhāyabhāvasampaṭicchanavevacanāni.
atk-vin02a2:129_8: Kāyena viññāpetīti evaṃ saddhivihārikena “upajjhāyo me bhante hohī”ti tikkhattuṃ
atk-vin02a2:129_9: vutte sace upajjhāyo “sāhū”tiādīsu pañcasu padesu yassa kassaci padassa vasena kāyena
atk-vin02a2:129_10: vā vācāya vā kāyavācāhi vā “gahito tayā upajjhāyo”ti upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ viññāpeti,
atk-vin02a2:129_11: gahito hoti upajjhāyo. Idameva hi ettha upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ, yadidaṃ upajjhāyassa imesu
atk-vin02a2:129_12: pañcasu padesu yassa kassaci padassa vācāya vā sāvanaṃ kāyena vā atthaviññāpananti.
atk-vin02a2:129_13: Keci pana sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāya vadanti. Na taṃ pamāṇaṃ, āyācanadānamattena
atk-vin02a2:129_14: hi gahito hoti upajjhāyo, na ettha sampaṭicchanaṃ aṅgaṃ. Saddhivihārikenāpi na kevalaṃ
atk-vin02a2:129_15: iminā me padena upajjhāyo gahitoti ñātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Ajjatagge dāni thero mayhaṃ bhāro,
atk-vin02a2:129_16: ahampi therassa bhāro”ti idampi ñātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:130_0: 66. Tatrāyaṃ sammāvattanāti yaṃ vuttaṃ sammā vattitabbanti, tatra ayaṃ sammāvattanā.
atk-vin02a2:130_1: Kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvāti sacassa paccūsakāle caṅkamanatthāya vā dhotapādapariharaṇatthāya
atk-vin02a2:130_2: vā paṭimukkā upāhanā pādagatā honti, tā kālasseva uṭṭhāya apanetvā. Dantakaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a2:130_3: dātabbanti mahantaṃ majjhimaṃ khuddakanti tīṇi dantakaṭṭhāni upanetvā tato yaṃ tīṇi
atk-vin02a2:130_4: divasāni gaṇhāti, catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya tādisameva dātabbaṃ. Sace aniyamaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a2:130_5: yaṃ vā taṃ vā gaṇhāti, atha yādisaṃ labhati tādisaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:131_0: Mukhodakaṃ dātabbanti sītañca uṇhañca udakaṃ upanetvā tato yaṃ tīṇi divasāni vaḷañjeti,
atk-vin02a2:131_1: catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya tādisameva mukhadhovanodakaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sace aniyamaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a2:131_2: yaṃ vā taṃ vā gaṇhāti, atha yādisaṃ labhati tādisaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sace duvidhampi vaḷañjeti,
atk-vin02a2:131_3: duvidhampi upanetabbaṃ. Udakaṃ mukhadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vaccakuṭito paṭṭhāya sammajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:131_4: There vaccakuṭiṃ gate pariveṇaṃ sammajjitabbaṃ; evaṃ pariveṇaṃ asuññaṃ hoti. There
atk-vin02a2:131_5: vaccakuṭito anikkhanteyeva āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ. Sarīrakiccaṃ katvā āgantvā tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a2:131_6: nisinnassa “sace yāgu hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttavattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Uklāpoti kenaci kacavarena
atk-vin02a2:131_7: saṅkiṇṇo, sace pana añño kacavaro natthi, udakaphusitāneva honti, hatthenapi pamajjitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:132_0: Saguṇaṃ katvāti dve cīvarāni ekato katvā, tā ekato katā dvepi saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā.
atk-vin02a2:132_1: Sabbañhi cīvaraṃ saṅghaṭitattā “saṅghāṭī”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:132_2: Nātidūre gantabbaṃ nāccāsanneti ettha sace upajjhāyaṃ nivattitvā olokentaṃ ekena
atk-vin02a2:132_3: vā dvīhi vā padavītihārehi sampāpuṇāti, ettāvatā nātidūre nāccāsanne gato hotīti
atk-vin02a2:132_4: veditabbaṃ. Pattapariyāpannaṃ paṭiggahetabbanti sace upajjhāyena bhikkhācāre yāguyā
atk-vin02a2:132_5: vā bhatte vā laddhe patto uṇho vā bhāriko vā hoti, attano pattaṃ tassa datvā so patto
atk-vin02a2:132_6: gahetabboti attho. Na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbāti antaraghare
atk-vin02a2:132_7: vā aññatra vā bhaṇamānassa aniṭṭhite tassa vacane aññā kathā na samuṭṭhāpetabbā.
atk-vin02a2:132_8: Ito paṭṭhāya ca pana yattha yattha nakārena paṭisedho kariyati, sabbattha dukkaṭāpatti
atk-vin02a2:132_9: veditabbā. Ayañhi khandhakadhammatā. Āpattisāmantā bhaṇamānoti padasodhammaduṭṭhullādivasena
atk-vin02a2:132_10: āpattiyā āsannavācaṃ bhaṇamāno. Nivāretabboti “kiṃ bhante īdisaṃ nāma vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a2:132_11: āpatti na hotī”ti evaṃ pucchantena viya vāretabbo. Vāressāmīti pana katvā “mahallaka,
atk-vin02a2:133_0: Paṭhamataraṃ āgantvāti sace āsanne gāmo hoti, vihāre vā gilāno bhikkhu hoti, gāmato
atk-vin02a2:133_1: paṭhamataraṃ āgantabbaṃ. Sace dūre gāmo hoti, upajjhāyena saddhiṃ āgacchanto natthi,
atk-vin02a2:133_2: teneva saddhiṃ gāmato nikkhamitvā cīvarena pattaṃ veṭhetvā antarāmaggato paṭhamataraṃ
atk-vin02a2:133_3: āgantabbaṃ. Evaṃ nivattantena paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā āsanapaññāpanādi sabbaṃ kiccaṃ
atk-vin02a2:133_4: kātabbaṃ. Sinnaṃ hotīti tintaṃ sedaggahitaṃ. Caturaṅgulaṃ kaṇṇaṃ ussāretvāti kaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a2:133_5: caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ atirekaṃ katvā evaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃharitabbaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Mā majjhe
atk-vin02a2:133_6: bhaṅgo ahosīti. Samaṃ katvā saṃharitassa hi majjhe bhaṅgo hoti, tato niccaṃ bhijjamānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:133_7: dubbalaṃ hoti taṃ nivāraṇatthametaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā yathā ajja bhaṅgaṭṭhāneyeva sve
atk-vin02a2:133_8: na bhijjati, tathā divase divase caturaṅgulaṃ ussāretvā saṃharitabbaṃ. Obhoge kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-vin02a2:133_9: kātabbanti kāyabandhanaṃ saṃharitvā cīvarabhoge pakkhipitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:134_0: Sace piṇḍapāto hotīti ettha yo gāmeyeva vā antaraghare vā paṭikkamane vā bhuñjitvā
atk-vin02a2:134_1: āgacchati, piṇḍaṃ vā na labhati, tassa piṇḍapāto na hoti, gāme abhuttassa pana laddhabhikkhassa
atk-vin02a2:134_2: vā hoti; tasmā “sace piṇḍapāto hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sacepi tassa na hoti, bhuñjitukāmo
atk-vin02a2:134_3: ca hoti, udakaṃ datvā attanā laddhatopi piṇḍapāto upanetabbo. Pānīyena pucchitabboti
atk-vin02a2:134_4: bhuñjamāno tikkhattuṃ “pānīyaṃ bhante āhariyatū”ti pānīyena pucchitabbo. Sace kālo
atk-vin02a2:134_5: atthi, upajjhāye bhutte sayaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace upakaṭṭho kālo, pānīyaṃ upajjhāyassa
atk-vin02a2:135_0: Anantarahitāyāti taṭṭikadhammakhaṇḍādīsu yena kenaci anatthatāya paṃsusakkharamissāya
atk-vin02a2:135_1: bhūmiyā pattho na ṭhapetabboti attho. Sace pana kāḷavaṇṇakatā vā sudhābaddhā vā hoti
atk-vin02a2:135_2: nirajamattikā, tathārūpāya bhūmiyā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dhotavālikāyapi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:135_3: Paṃsurajasakkharādīsu na vaṭṭati. Tatra pana paṇṇaṃ vā ādhārakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā tatra
atk-vin02a2:135_4: nikkhipitabbo. Pārato antaṃ orato bhoganti idaṃ cīvaravaṃsādīnaṃ heṭṭhā hatthaṃ pavesetvā
atk-vin02a2:135_5: abhimukhena hatthena saṇikaṃ nikkhipanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ante pana gahetvā bhogena cīvaravaṃsādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a2:135_6: upari nikkhipantassa bhittiyaṃ bhogo paṭihaññati, tasmā tathā na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:136_0: Cuṇṇaṃ sannetabbanti nhānacuṇṇaṃ udakena temetvā piṇḍi kātabbā. Ekamantaṃ nikkhipitabbanti
atk-vin02a2:136_1: ekasmiṃ niddhūme ṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṃ. Jantāghare parikammaṃ nāma aṅgāramattikauṇhodakadānādikaṃ
atk-vin02a2:136_2: sabbaṃ kiccaṃ. Udakepi parikammanti aṅgapaccaṅgaghaṃsanādikaṃ sabbaṃ kiccaṃ. Pānīyena
atk-vin02a2:136_3: pucchitabboti jantāghare uṇhasantāpena pipāsā hoti, tasmā pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:137_0: Sace ussahatīti sace pahoti; na kenaci gelaññena abhibhūto hoti; agilānena hi saddhivihārikena
atk-vin02a2:137_1: saṭṭhivassenāpi sabbaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ, anādarena akarontassa vattabhede
atk-vin02a2:137_2: dukkaṭaṃ. Nakārapaṭisaṃyuttesu pana padesu gilānassāpi paṭikkhittakiriyaṃ karontassa
atk-vin02a2:137_3: dukkaṭameva. Appaṭighaṃsantenāti bhūmiyaṃ appaṭighaṃsantena. Kavāṭapiṭṭhanti kavāṭañca
atk-vin02a2:137_5: Ullokā paṭhamaṃ ohāretabbanti ullokato paṭhamaṃ ullokaṃ ādiṃkatvā avaharitabbanti
atk-vin02a2:137_6: attho. Ālokasandhikaṇṇabhāgāti ālokasandhibhāgā ca kaṇṇabhāgā ca antarabāhiravātapānakavāṭakāni
atk-vin02a2:137_7: ca gabbhassa ca cattāro koṇā pamajjitabbāti attho.
atk-vin02a2:138_0: Yathāpaññattaṃ paññapetabbanti yathā paṭhamaṃ paññattaṃ ahosi, tatheva paññapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:138_1: Etadatthameva hi yathāpaññattaṃ sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantaṃ nikkhipitabbanti
atk-vin02a2:138_2: purimavattaṃ paññattaṃ. Sace pana paṭhamaṃ ajānantena kenaci paññattaṃ ahosi, samantato
atk-vin02a2:138_3: bhittiṃ dvaṅgulamattena vā tivaṅgulamattena vā mocetvā paññapetabbaṃ. Idañhi paññāpanavattaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:138_4: Sace kaṭasārako hoti atimahanto ca, chinditvā koṭiṃ nivattetvā bandhitvā paññapetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:138_5: Sace koṭiṃ nivattetvā bandhituṃ na jānāti, na chinditabbo. Puratthimā vātapānā thaketabbāti
atk-vin02a2:138_6: puratthimāya vātapānā thaketabbā. Evaṃ sesāpi vātapānā thaketabbā.
atk-vin02a2:139_0: Vūpakāsetabboti aññattha netabbo. Vūpakāsāpetabboti añño bhikkhu vattabbo “theraṃ
atk-vin02a2:139_1: gahetvā aññattha gacchā”ti vivecetabbanti vissajjāpetabbaṃ. Vivecāpetabbanti añño
atk-vin02a2:139_2: vattabbo “theraṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vissajjāpehī”ti. Ussukkaṃ kātabbanti parivāsadānatthaṃ
atk-vin02a2:139_3: so so bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā yācitabbo. Sace attanā paṭibalo hoti, attanāva dātabbo.
atk-vin02a2:139_4: No ce paṭibalo hoti, aññena dāpetabbo. Kinti nu khoti kena nu kho upāyena. Esa nayo
atk-vin02a2:139_5: sabbattha. Lahukāya vā pariṇāmeyyāti ukkhepanīyaṃ akatvā tajjanīyaṃ vā niyassaṃ vā
atk-vin02a2:139_6: kareyyāti attho. Tena hi “upajjhāyassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kattukāmo saṅgho”ti ñatvā
atk-vin02a2:139_7: ekamekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mā bhante amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa kammaṃ karitthā”ti
atk-vin02a2:139_8: yācitabbā. Sace karontiyeva, “tajjanīyaṃ vā niyassaṃ vā karothā”ti yācitabbā. Sace
atk-vin02a2:139_9: karontiyeva, atha upajjhāyo “sammā vattatha bhante”ti yācitabbo. Iti taṃ sammā vattāpetvā
atk-vin02a2:140_0: Samparivattakaṃ samparivattakanti samparivattetvā samparivattetvā. Na ca acchinne
atk-vin02a2:140_1: theve pakkamitabbanti yadi appamattakampi rajanaṃ gaḷati, na tāva pakkamitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:140_2: Na upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā ekaccassa patto dātabbotiādi sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa visabhāgapuggalavasena
atk-vin02a2:140_3: kathitaṃ. Na upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā gāmo pavisitabboti piṇḍāya vā aññena vā karaṇīyena
atk-vin02a2:140_4: pavisitukāmena āpucchitvāva pavisitabbo. Sace upajjhāyo kālasseva vuṭṭhāya dūraṃ
atk-vin02a2:140_5: bhikkhācāraṃ gantukāmo hoti, “daharā piṇḍāya pavisantū”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ. Avatvā
atk-vin02a2:140_6: gate pariveṇaṃ gantvā upajjhāyaṃ apassantena gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace gāmaṃ
atk-vin02a2:140_7: pavisantopi passati, diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya āpucchituṃyeva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:141_0: Na susānaṃ gantabbanti vāsatthāya vā dassanatthāya vā na gantabbaṃ. Na disā pakkamitabbāti
atk-vin02a2:141_1: ettha pakkamitukāmena kammaṃ ācikkhitvā yāvatatiyaṃ yācitabbo. Sace anujānāti, sādhu;
atk-vin02a2:141_2: no ce anujānāti, taṃ nissāya vasato cassa uddeso vā paripucchā vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā
atk-vin02a2:141_3: na sampajjati, upajjhāyo bālo hoti abyatto, kevalaṃ attano santike vasāpetukāmatāya
atk-vin02a2:141_4: eva gantuṃ na deti, evarūpe nivārentepi gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbanti
atk-vin02a2:141_5: gelaññato vuṭṭhānaṃ assa āgametabbaṃ; na katthaci gantabbaṃ. Sace añño bhikkhu upaṭṭhāko
atk-vin02a2:141_6: atthi, bhesajjaṃ pariyesitvā tassa hatthe datvā “bhante ayaṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:144_1: uddesādīhissa saṅgaho ca anuggaho ca kattabbo. Tattha uddesoti pāḷivācanaṃ. Paripucchāti
atk-vin02a2:144_2: pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanā. Ovādoti anotiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ “idaṃ karohi, idaṃ mā karitthā”ti
atk-vin02a2:144_3: vacanaṃ. Anusāsanīti otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ. Api ca otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-vin02a2:144_4: ovādo; punappunaṃ vacanaṃ anusāsanīti. Sace upajjhāyassa patto hotīti sace atirekapatto
atk-vin02a2:144_5: hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Parikkhāroti aññopi samaṇaparikkhāro. Idha ussukkaṃ nāma
atk-vin02a2:144_6: dhammikena nayena uppajjamānaupāyapariyesanaṃ. Ito paraṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-vin02a2:144_7: ācamanakumbhiyā udakāsiñcanapariyosānaṃ vattaṃ gilānasseva saddhivihārikassa kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:144_8: Anabhirativūpakāsanādi pana agilānassāpi kattabbameva. Cīvaraṃ rajantenāti “evaṃ
atk-vin02a2:144_9: rajeyyāsī”ti upajjhāyato upāyaṃ sutvā rajantena. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:147_0: 68. Na sammā vattantīti yathāpaññattaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ na pūrenti. Yo na sammā vatteyyāti
atk-vin02a2:147_1: yo yathāpaññattaṃ vattaṃ na pūreyya; so dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti attho. Paṇāmetabboti
atk-vin02a2:147_2: apasādetabbo. Na adhimattaṃ pemaṃ hotīti upajjhāyamhi adhimattaṃ gehassitapemaṃ na
atk-vin02a2:147_3: hoti. Nādhimattā bhāvanā hotīti adhimattā mettābhāvanā na hoti; vuttapaṭipakkhanayena
atk-vin02a2:147_4: sukkapakkho veditabbo. Alaṃ paṇāmetunti yutto paṇāmetuṃ.
atk-vin02a2:148_0: Appaṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro hotīti sadoso hoti, āpattiṃ āpajjati; tasmā na sammā
atk-vin02a2:148_1: vattanto paṇāmetabbova. Na sammāvattanāya ca yāva cīvararajanaṃ tāva vatte akariyamāne
atk-vin02a2:148_2: upajjhāyassa parihāni hoti. Tasmā taṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassāpi amuttakassāpi
atk-vin02a2:148_3: āpattiyeva. Ekaccassa pattadānato paṭṭhāya amuttakanissayasseva āpatti.
atk-vin02a2:149_0: Saddhivihārikā sammā vattanti, upajjhāyo sammā na vattati, upajjhāyassa āpatti. Upajjhāyo
atk-vin02a2:149_1: sammā vattati, saddhivihārikā sammā na vattanti, tesaṃ āpatti. Upajjhāye vattaṃ sādiyante
atk-vin02a2:149_2: saddhivihārikā bahukāpi honti, sabbesaṃ āpatti. Sace upajjhāyo “mayhaṃ upaṭṭhāko
atk-vin02a2:149_3: atthi, tumhe attano sajjhāyamanasikārādīsu yogaṃ karothā”ti vadati, saddhivihārikānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:149_4: anāpatti. Sace upajjhāyo sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ vā na jānāti, bālo hoti, saddhivihārikā
atk-vin02a2:149_5: bahukā. Tesu eko vattasampanno bhikkhu “upajjhāyassa kiccaṃ ahaṃ karissāmi, tumhe
atk-vin02a2:149_6: appossukkā viharathā”ti evañce attano bhāraṃ katvā itare vissajjeti, tassa bhārakaraṇato
atk-vin02a2:152_0: 69. Rādhabrāhmaṇavatthusmiṃ – kiñcāpi āyasmā sāriputto bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ tīhi
atk-vin02a2:152_1: saraṇagamanehi anuññātaṃ pabbajjañceva upasampadañca jānāti, bhagavā pana taṃ lahukaṃ
atk-vin02a2:152_2: upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñatticatutthakammena garukaṃ katvā upasampadaṃ anuññātukāmo.
atk-vin02a2:152_3: Athassa thero ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “kathāhaṃ bhante taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pabbājemi upasampādemī”ti
atk-vin02a2:152_4: āha. Buddhānañhi parisā ajjhāsayakusalā honti, ayañca buddhaparisāya aggo.
atk-vin02a2:153_0: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalenāti ettha byatto nāma yassa sāṭṭhakathaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:153_1: vācuggataṃ pavattati, tasmiṃ asati yassa antamaso idaṃ ñatticatutthakammavācāmattampi
atk-vin02a2:153_2: suggahitaṃ hoti, vācuggataṃ pavattati, ayampi imasmiṃ atthe byatto. Yo pana kāsasosasemhādinā
atk-vin02a2:153_3: vā gelaññena oṭṭhadantajivhādīnaṃ vā asampattiyā pariyattiyaṃ vā akataparicayattā
atk-vin02a2:153_4: na sakkoti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi kammavācaṃ sāvetuṃ, byañjanaṃ vā padaṃ vā
atk-vin02a2:153_5: hāpeti, aññathā vā vattabbaṃ aññathā vadati, ayaṃ appaṭibalo. Tabbiparīto imasmiṃ
atk-vin02a2:153_6: atthe “paṭibalo”ti veditabbo. Saṅgho ñāpetabboti saṅgho jānāpetabbo. Tato paraṃ yaṃ
atk-vin02a2:153_7: saṅgho jānāpetabbo, taṃ dassetuṃ “suṇātu me bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a2:154_0: 71. Upasampannasamanantarāti upasampanno hutvā samanantarā. Anācāraṃ ācaratīti paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ
atk-vin02a2:154_1: karoti. Ullumpatu manti uddharatu maṃ, akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhapetu; sāmaṇerabhāvā
atk-vin02a2:154_2: vā uddharitvā bhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāpetūti. Anukampaṃ upādāyāti anuddayaṃ paṭicca;
atk-vin02a2:155: 73. Aṭṭhitā hotīti niccappavattinī hoti. Cattāro nissayeti cattāro paccaye. Yasmā cattāro paccaye nissāya attabhāvo pavattati, tasmā te nissayāti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a2:158_0: 75. Kintāyaṃ bhikkhu hotīti kiṃ te ayaṃ bhikkhu hoti. Aññehi ovadiyo anusāsiyoti
atk-vin02a2:158_1: aññehi ovaditabbo ceva anusāsitabbo ca. Bāhullāya āvatto yadidaṃ gaṇabandhikanti
atk-vin02a2:158_2: gaṇabandho etassa bāhullassa atthīti gaṇabandhikaṃ, bāhullaṃ. Yaṃ idaṃ gaṇabandhikaṃ
atk-vin02a2:158_3: nāma bāhullaṃ, tadatthāya atilahuṃ tvaṃ āpannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a2:159_0: 76. Abyattāti paññāveyyattiyena virahitā. Aññattaropi aññatitthiyapubboti pasūro
atk-vin02a2:159_1: paribbājako. So kira “dhammaṃ thenessāmī”ti udāyittherassa santike pabbajitvā tena
atk-vin02a2:159_2: sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno tassa vādaṃ āropesi. Anujānāmi bhikkhave byattena bhikkhunātiādimhi
atk-vin02a2:159_3: byatto pubbe bhikkhunovādakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttalakkhaṇoyeva. Yo pana antevāsino vā saddhivihārikassa
atk-vin02a2:159_4: vā gilānassa sakkoti upaṭṭhānādīni kātuṃ, ayaṃ idha paṭibaloti adhippeto. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-vin02a2:160_0: “Pañcahupāli, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero
atk-vin02a2:160_1: upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Katamehi pañcahi? Paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā gilānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:160_2: upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā, anabhirataṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā, uppannaṃ
atk-vin02a2:160_3: kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ, abhidhamme vinetuṃ, abhivinaye vinetū”nti.
atk-vin02a2:161_0: 77. Pakkhasaṅkantesūti titthiyapakkhasaṅkantesu. Anujānāmi bhikkhave ācariyanti ācārasamācārasikkhāpanakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:161_1: ācariyaṃ anujānāmi. Ācariyo bhikkhave antevāsikamhītiādi sabbaṃ “upajjhāyo bhikkhave
atk-vin02a2:161_2: saddhivihārikamhī”tiādinā nayena vuttavaseneva veditabbaṃ. Nāmamattameva hi ettha nānaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:164_0: 80. Antevāsikā ācariyesu na sammā vattantīti ettha pana yaṃ pubbe “nasammāvattanāya
atk-vin02a2:164_1: ca yāva cīvararajanaṃ, tāva vatte akariyamāne upajjhāyassa parihāni hoti, tasmā taṃ
atk-vin02a2:164_2: akarontassa nissayamuttakassāpi amuttakassāpi āpattiyevā”ti ca, “ekaccassa pattadānato
atk-vin02a2:164_3: paṭṭhāya amuttakanissayasseva āpattī”ti ca lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, na teneva lakkhaṇena
atk-vin02a2:164_4: nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā. Nissayantevāsikena hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya
atk-vin02a2:164_5: vasati, tāva sabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Pabbajjāupasampadādhammantevāsikehi pana
atk-vin02a2:164_6: nissayamuttakehipi ādito paṭṭhāya yāva cīvararajanaṃ, tāva vattaṃ kātabbaṃ; anāpucchitvā
atk-vin02a2:164_7: pattadānādimhi pana etesaṃ anāpatti. Etesu ca pabbajjantevāsiko ca upasampadantevāsiko
atk-vin02a2:164_8: ca ācariyassa yāvajīvaṃ bhāro. Nissayantevāsiko ca dhammantevāsiko ca yāva samīpe
atk-vin02a2:164_9: vasanti, tāvadeva. Tasmā ācariyenāpi tesu sammā vattitabbaṃ. Ācariyantevāsikesu hi
atk-vin02a2:164_10: yo yo na sammā vattati, tassa tassa āpatti.
atk-vin02a2:167_0: 83. Upajjhāyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu – upajjhāyo pakkanto vātiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayo
atk-vin02a2:167_1: – pakkantoti tamhā āvāsā vippavasitukāmo pakkanto disaṃ gato. Evaṃ gate ca pana tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a2:167_2: sace vihāre nissayadāyako atthi, yassa santike aññadāpi nissayo vā gahitapubbo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:167_3: yo vā ekasambhogaparibhogo, tassa santike nissayo gahetabbo, ekadivasampi parihāro
atk-vin02a2:167_4: natthi. Sace tādiso natthi, añño lajjī pesalo atthi, tassa lajjīpesalabhāvaṃ jānantena
atk-vin02a2:167_5: tadaheva nissayo yācitabbo. Sace deti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Atha pana “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo
atk-vin02a2:167_6: lahuṃ āgamissatī”ti pucchati, upajjhāyena ca tathā vuttaṃ, “āma, bhante”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:167_7: Sace vadati “tena hi upajjhāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamethā”ti vaṭṭati. Atha panassa pakatiyā
atk-vin02a2:167_8: pesalabhāvaṃ na jānāti, cattāri pañca divasāni tassa bhikkhuno sabhāgataṃ oloketvā
atk-vin02a2:168_0: Sace pana vihāre nissayadāyako natthi, upajjhāyo ca “ahaṃ katipāhena āgamissāmi,
atk-vin02a2:168_1: mā ukkaṇṭhitthā”ti vatvā gato, yāva āgamanā parihāro labbhati. Athāpi naṃ tattha
atk-vin02a2:168_2: manussā paricchinnakālato uttaripi pañca vā dasa vā divasāni vāsentiyeva, tena vihāraṃ
atk-vin02a2:168_3: pavatti pesetabbā “daharā mā ukkaṇṭhantu, ahaṃ asukadivasaṃ nāma āgamissāmī”ti. Evampi
atk-vin02a2:168_4: parihāro labbhati. Atha āgacchato antarāmagge nadīpūrena vā corādīhi vā upaddavo
atk-vin02a2:168_5: hoti, thero udakosakkanaṃ vā āgameti, sahāye vā pariyesati, tañce pavattiṃ daharā
atk-vin02a2:168_6: suṇanti, yāva āgamanā parihāro labbhati. Sace pana so “idhevāhaṃ vasissāmī”ti pahiṇati,
atk-vin02a2:168_7: parihāro natthi. Yattha nissayo labbhati, tattha gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:169_0: Vibbhante pana kālaṅkate pakkhasaṅkante vā ekadivasampi parihāro natthi. Yattha nissayo
atk-vin02a2:169_1: labbhati, tattha gantabbaṃ. Āṇattīti pana nissayapaṇāmanā vuccati. Tasmā “paṇāmemi
atk-vin02a2:169_2: ta”nti vā “mā idha paṭikkamī”ti vā “nīhara te pattacīvara”nti vā “nāhaṃ tayā upaṭṭhātabbo”ti
atk-vin02a2:169_3: vāti iminā pāḷinayena “mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchī”tiādinā pāḷimuttakanayena vā
atk-vin02a2:169_4: yo nissayapaṇāmanāya paṇāmito hoti, tena upajjhāyo khamāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:170_0: Sace āditova na khamati, daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā tikkhattuṃ tāva sayameva khamāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:170_1: No ce khamati, tasmiṃ vihāre mahāthere gahetvā khamāpetabbo. No ce khamati, sāmantavihāre
atk-vin02a2:170_2: bhikkhū gahetvā khamāpetabbo. Sace evampi na khamati, aññattha gantvā upajjhāyassa
atk-vin02a2:170_3: sabhāgānaṃ santike vasitabbaṃ “appeva nāma sabhāgānaṃ me santike vasatīti ñatvāpi
atk-vin02a2:170_4: khameyyā”ti. Sace evampi na khamati, tatreva vasitabbaṃ. Tatra ce dubbhikkhādidosena
atk-vin02a2:170_5: na sakkā hoti vasituṃ, taṃyeva vihāraṃ āgantvā aññassa santike nissayaṃ gahetvā vasituṃ
atk-vin02a2:171_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu ācariyo pakkanto vā hotīti ettha koci ācariyo
atk-vin02a2:171_1: āpucchitvā pakkamati, koci anāpucchitvā. Antevāsikopi evameva. Tatra sace antevāsiko
atk-vin02a2:171_2: ācariyaṃ āpucchati “asukaṃ nāma bhante ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ icchāmi kenacideva karaṇīyenā”ti,
atk-vin02a2:171_3: ācariyena ca “kadā gamissasī”ti vutto “sāyanhe vā rattiṃ vā uṭṭhahitvā gamissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a2:171_4: vadati, ācariyopi “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati, taṅkhaṇaññeva nissayo paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin02a2:172_0: Sace pana “bhante asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gantukāmomhī”ti vutte ācariyo “asukasmiṃ nāma
atk-vin02a2:172_1: gāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchā jānissasī”ti vadati, so ca “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati, tato
atk-vin02a2:172_2: ce gato, sugato. Sace pana na gacchati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Athāpi “gacchāmī”ti
atk-vin02a2:172_3: vutte ācariyena “mā tāva gaccha, rattiṃ mantetvā jānissāmā”ti vutto mantetvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a2:172_4: sugato. No ce gacchati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Ācariyaṃ anāpucchā pakkamantassa
atk-vin02a2:172_5: pana upacārasīmātikkame nissayo paṭippassambhati. Antoupacārasīmato paṭinivattantassa
atk-vin02a2:173_0: Sace pana ācariyo antevāsikaṃ āpucchati “āvuso asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti, antevāsikena
atk-vin02a2:173_1: ca “kadā”ti vutte “sāyanhe vā rattibhāge vā”ti vadati, antevāsikopi “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati,
atk-vin02a2:174_0: Sace pana ācariyo “sve piṇḍāya caritvā gamissāmī”ti vadati, itaro ca “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati,
atk-vin02a2:174_1: ekadivasaṃ tāva nissayo na paṭippassambhati, punadivase paṭippassaddho hoti. “Asukasmiṃ
atk-vin02a2:174_2: nāma gāme piṇḍāya caritvā jānissāmi mama gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā”ti vatvā sace na
atk-vin02a2:174_3: gacchati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Athāpi “gacchāmī”ti vutte antevāsikena “mā
atk-vin02a2:174_4: tāva gacchatha, rattiṃ mantetvā jānissathā”ti vutto mantetvāpi na gacchati, nissayo
atk-vin02a2:175_0: Sace ubhopi ācariyantevāsikā kenaci karaṇīyena bahisīmaṃ gacchanti, tato ce ācariyo
atk-vin02a2:175_1: gamiyacitte uppanne anāpucchāva gantvā dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antoyeva nivattati, nissayo
atk-vin02a2:175_2: na paṭippassambhati. Sace dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā nivattati, paṭippassaddho hoti.
atk-vin02a2:175_3: Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasanti, nissayo paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin02a2:176_0: Ācariye vibbhante kālaṅkate pakkhasaṅkante ca taṅkhaṇaññeva paṭippassambhati. Āṇattiyaṃ
atk-vin02a2:176_1: pana sacepi ācariyo muñcitukāmova hutvā nissayapaṇāmanāya paṇāmeti, antevāsiko ca
atk-vin02a2:176_2: “kiñcāpi maṃ ācariyo paṇāmeti, atha kho hadayena muduko”ti sālayova hoti, nissayo
atk-vin02a2:176_3: na paṭippassambhatiyeva. Sacepi ācariyo sālayo, antevāsiko nirālayo, “na dāni imaṃ
atk-vin02a2:176_4: nissāya vasissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, evampi na paṭippassambhati. Ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāve
atk-vin02a2:176_5: pana na paṭippassambhatiyeva. Ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena paṭippassambhati. Paṇāmitena
atk-vin02a2:176_6: daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā tikkhattuṃ khamāpetabbo. No ce khamati, upajjhāye vuttanayena paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:177_0: Upajjhāyena vā samodhānagatoti ettha dassanasavanavasena samodhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin02a2:177_1: hi ācariyaṃ nissāya vasanto saddhivihāriko ekavihāre cetiyaṃ vā vandantaṃ ekagāme
atk-vin02a2:177_2: piṇḍāya vā carantaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passati, nissayo paṭippassambhati. Upajjhāyo passati,
atk-vin02a2:177_3: saddhivihāriko pana na passati, na paṭippassambhati. Maggappaṭipannaṃ vā ākāsena
atk-vin02a2:177_4: vā gacchantaṃ upajjhāyaṃ disvā dūrattā bhikkhūti jānāti, upajjhāyoti na jānāti, na
atk-vin02a2:177_5: paṭippassambhati. Sace jānāti, paṭippassambhati. Uparipāsāde upajjhāyo vasati, heṭṭhā
atk-vin02a2:177_6: saddhivihāriko, taṃ adisvāva yāguṃ pivitvā pakkamati, āsanasālāya vā nisinnaṃ adisvāva
atk-vin02a2:177_7: ekamante bhuñjitvā pakkamati, dhammassavanamaṇḍape vā nisinnampi taṃ adisvāva dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a2:177_8: sutvā pakkamati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Evaṃ tāva dassanavasena samodhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:178_0: Savanavasena pana sace upajjhāyassa vihāre vā antaraghare vā dhammaṃ kathentassa
atk-vin02a2:178_1: anumodanaṃ vā karontassa saddaṃ sutvā “upajjhāyassa me saddo”ti sañjānāti, nissayo
atk-vin02a2:178_2: paṭippassambhati. Asañjānantassa na paṭippassambhatīti ayaṃ samodhāne vinicchayo.
atk-vin02a2:181_0: 84. Idāni yaṃ pubbe “anujānāmi bhikkhave byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena
atk-vin02a2:181_1: vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetuṃ, nissayaṃ dātu”nti saṅkhepato upajjhāyācariyānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:181_2: lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatenā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a2:181_3: Tattha pañcahi aṅgehīti pañcahi aguṇaṅgehi. So hi sīlakkhandhādīhi asamannāgatattāva
atk-vin02a2:181_4: aguṇaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Na upasampādetabbanti upajjhāyena hutvā na upasampādetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:181_5: Na nissayo dātabboti ācariyena hutvā nissayo na dātabbo. Ettha ca na asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti
atk-vin02a2:181_6: ca attanā na asekkhenāti ca assaddhoti ca ādīsu tīsu pañcakesu ayuttavasena paṭikkhepo
atk-vin02a2:181_7: kato, na āpattiaṅgavasena. Yo hi asekkhehi sīlakkhandhādīhi asamannāgato pare ca
atk-vin02a2:181_8: tattha samādapetuṃ asakkonto assaddhiyādidosayuttova hutvā parisaṃ pariharati, tassa
atk-vin02a2:181_9: parisā sīlādīhi parihāyatiyeva, na vaḍḍhati. Tasmā tena na upasampādetabbantiādi
atk-vin02a2:181_10: ayuttavasena vuttaṃ, na āpattiaṅgavasena. Na hi khīṇāsavasseva upajjhāyācariyabhāvo
atk-vin02a2:181_11: bhagavatā anuññāto. Yadi tasseva anuññāto abhavissa, “sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati
atk-vin02a2:181_12: uppannā hotī”tiādiṃ na vadeyya. Yasmā pana khīṇāsavassa parisā sīlādīhi na parihāyati,
atk-vin02a2:181_13: tasmā “pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:182_0: Adhisīle sīlavipannotiādīsu pārājikañca saṅghādisesañca āpanno adhisīle sīlavipanno
atk-vin02a2:182_1: nāma. Itare pañcāpattikkhandhe āpanno ajjhācāre ācāravipanno nāma. Sammādiṭṭhiṃ pahāya
atk-vin02a2:182_2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno nāma. Yattakaṃ sutaṃ
atk-vin02a2:182_3: parisaṃ pariharantassa icchitabbaṃ, tena virahitattā appassuto. Yaṃ tena jānitabbaṃ
atk-vin02a2:182_4: āpattādi, tassa ajānanato duppañño. Imasmiṃ pañcake purimāni tīṇi padāni ayuttavasena
atk-vin02a2:183_0: Āpattiṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ nāma mayā kata”nti vutte “imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ ayaṃ āpanno”ti
atk-vin02a2:183_1: na jānāti. Vuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti vuṭṭhānagāminito vā desanāgāminito vā āpattito evaṃ
atk-vin02a2:183_2: nāma vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti na jānāti. Imasmiṃ pañcake purimāni dve padāni ayuttavasena
atk-vin02a2:184_0: Ābhisamācārikāya sikkhāyāti khandhakavatte vinetuṃ na paṭibalo hotīti attho. Ādibrahmacariyakāyāti
atk-vin02a2:184_1: sekkhapaṇṇattiyaṃ vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho. Abhidhammeti nāmarūpaparicchede vinetuṃ
atk-vin02a2:184_2: na paṭibaloti attho. Abhivinayeti sakale vinayapiṭake vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho.
atk-vin02a2:184_3: Vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti ca sabbattha sikkhāpetuṃ na sakkotīti attho. Dhammato vivecetunti
atk-vin02a2:184_4: dhammena kāraṇena vissajjāpetuṃ. Imasmi pañcake sabbapadesu āpatti. Āpattiṃ na jānātītiādipañcakasmimpi
atk-vin02a2:184_5: sabbapadesu āpatti. Ūnadasavassapariyosānapañcakepi eseva nayo. Iti ādito tayo pañcakā,
atk-vin02a2:184_6: catutthe tīṇi padāni, pañcame dve padānīti sabbepi cattāro pañcakā ayuttavasena vuttā.
atk-vin02a2:184_7: Catutthapañcake dve padāni, pañcame tīṇi, chaṭṭhasattamaaṭṭhamā tayo pañcakāti sabbepi
atk-vin02a2:184_8: cattāro pañcakā āpattiaṅgavasena vuttā; sukkapakkhe aṭṭhasu anāpattiyevāti.
atk-vin02a2:187_0: 85. Chakkesu ūnadasavassapadaṃ viseso, taṃ sabbattha āpattikaraṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a2:187_1: veditabbaṃ. Tattha ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni hontīti
atk-vin02a2:187_2: ubhatovibhaṅgavasena na svāgatāni. Na suvibhattānīti mātikāvibhaṅgavasena. Na suppavattīnīti
atk-vin02a2:187_3: vācuggatavasena. Na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanasoti mātikāto ca vibhaṅgato
atk-vin02a2:190_0: 86. Aññatitthiyapubbavatthusmiṃ – yo tāva ayaṃ pasūro, so titthiyapakkantakattā na
atk-vin02a2:190_1: upasampādetabbo. Yo pana aññopi nayidha pabbajitapubbo āgacchati, tasmiṃ yaṃ kattabbaṃ
atk-vin02a2:190_2: taṃ dassetuṃ “yo so bhikkhave aññopī”tiādimāha. Tattha tassa cattāro māse parivāso
atk-vin02a2:190_3: dātabboti ayaṃ titthiyaparivāso nāma; appaṭicchannaparivāsotipi vuccati. Ayaṃ pana
atk-vin02a2:190_4: naggaparibbājakasseva ājīvakassa vā acelakassa vā dātabbo. Sace sopi sāṭakaṃ vā vāḷakambalādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a2:190_5: aññataraṃ titthiyaddhajaṃ vā nivāsetvā āgacchati, nāssa parivāso dātabbo. Aññassa
atk-vin02a2:191_0: Paṭhamaṃ kesamassuntiādinā tassa āditova sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ pabbājentehi
atk-vin02a2:191_1: pana tasmiṃ saṅghamajjhe nisinneyeva “tvaṃ pabbājehi, tvaṃ ācariyo hohi, tvaṃ upajjhāyo
atk-vin02a2:191_2: hohī”ti therā bhikkhū na vattabbā. Evaṃ vuttā hi sace tassa ācariyupajjhāyabhāvena
atk-vin02a2:191_3: jigucchantā na sampaṭicchanti, atha so “nayime mayhaṃ saddahantī”ti kujjhitvāpi gaccheyya.
atk-vin02a2:191_4: Tasmā taṃ ekamantaṃ netvā tassa ācariyupajjhāyā pariyesitabbā.
atk-vin02a2:192_0: 87. Evaṃ kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti, evaṃ anārādhakoti ayamassa
atk-vin02a2:192_1: parivāsavattadassanatthaṃ mātikā. Kathañca bhikkhavetiādi tasseva vibhaṅgo. Tattha
atk-vin02a2:192_2: atikālena gāmaṃ pavisatīti bhikkhūnaṃ vattakaraṇavelāyameva gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-vin02a2:192_3: Atidivā paṭikkamatīti kulagharesu itthipurisadārakadārikādīhi saddhiṃ gehassitakathaṃ
atk-vin02a2:192_4: kathento tattheva bhuñjitvā bhikkhūsu pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā uddesaparipucchādīni
atk-vin02a2:192_5: vā karontesu paṭisallīnesu vā āgacchati; na upajjhāyavattaṃ nācariyavattaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a2:192_6: aññadatthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā niddāyati. Evampi bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo
atk-vin02a2:192_7: anārādhako hotīti evampi karonto parivāsavattassa sampādako pūrako na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:193_0: Vesiyāgocaro vātiādīsu vesiyāti āmisakiñcikkhasampadānādinā sulabhajjhācārā rūpūpajīvikā
atk-vin02a2:193_1: itthiyo. Vidhavāti matapatikā vā pavutthapatikā vā itthiyo; tā yena kenaci saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a2:193_2: mittabhāvaṃ patthenti. Thullakumārikāti yobbannappattā yobbannātītā vā kumāriyo;
atk-vin02a2:193_3: tā purisādhippāyāva vicaranti, yena kenaci saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ patthenti. Paṇḍakāti
atk-vin02a2:193_4: ussannakilesā avūpasantapariḷāhā napuṃsakā; te pariḷāhavegābhibhūtā yena kenaci saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a2:193_5: mittabhāvaṃ patthenti. Bhikkhuniyoti samānapabbajjā itthiyo; tāhi saddhiṃ khippameva
atk-vin02a2:194_0: Tattha vesiyānaṃ kulesu kulupako hutvā piṇḍapātacariyādīhi vā apadisitvā sinehasanthavajātena
atk-vin02a2:194_2: vuccati, so nacirasseva “asukavesiyā saddhiṃ gato”ti vattabbataṃ pāpuṇāti. Esa nayo
atk-vin02a2:194_3: sabbattha. Sace pana vesiyādayo salākabhattādīni denti, bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gantvā
atk-vin02a2:194_4: saddhiṃyeva bhuñjitvā vā gahetvā vā āgantuṃ vaṭṭati. Gilānā bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ
atk-vin02a2:194_5: vā dhammaṃ vā desetuṃ uddesaparipucchādīni vā dātuṃ gacchantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a2:194_6: gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Yo pana tathā āgantvā mittasanthavavasena gacchati, ayaṃ anārādhako hoti.
atk-vin02a2:195_0: Uccāvacāni karaṇīyānīti mahantakhuddakāni kammāni. Tattha ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā samaggena
atk-vin02a2:195_1: saṅghena sannipatitvā kattabbāni cetiyamahāpāsādapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni kammāni uccāni
atk-vin02a2:195_2: nāma. Cīvaradhovanarajanādīni khandhakapariyāpannāni ca aggisālavattādīni ābhisamācārikāni
atk-vin02a2:195_3: avacāni nāma. Tattha na dakkho hotīti tesu kammesu cheko susikkhito na hoti. Na analasoti
atk-vin02a2:195_4: uṭṭhānavīriyasampanno na hoti; “bhikkhusaṅghassa kammaṃ atthī”ti sutvā pageva bhattakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a2:195_5: katvā gabbhantaraṃ pavisitvā yāvadatthaṃ supitvā sāyaṃ nikkhamati. Tatrupāyāyāti
atk-vin02a2:195_6: tesu kammesu upāyabhūtāya. Vīmaṃsāyāti ṭhānuppattikavīmaṃsāya. “Idamevaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:195_7: idamevaṃ na kattabba”nti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe uppannapaññāya samannāgato na hoti. Na
atk-vin02a2:195_8: alaṃ kātuṃ na alaṃ saṃvidhātunti sahatthāpi kātuṃ samattho na hoti; “gaṇhatha bhante,
atk-vin02a2:195_9: gaṇha dahara, gaṇha sāmaṇera, sace tumhe vā na karissatha, amhe vā na karissāma,
atk-vin02a2:195_10: ko dāni imaṃ karissatī”ti evaṃ ussāhaṃ janetvā saṃvidhātuṃ aññamaññaṃ kāretumpi samattho
atk-vin02a2:195_11: na hoti. Bhikkhūhi “kammaṃ karissāmā”ti vutte kiñci rogaṃ apadisati, bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ
atk-vin02a2:195_12: karontānaṃ samīpeneva vicarati, sīsameva dasseti, ayampi anārādhako hoti.
atk-vin02a2:196_0: Na tibbacchando hotīti balavacchando na hoti. Uddeseti pāḷipariyāpuṇane. Paripucchāyāti
atk-vin02a2:196_1: atthasavane. Adhisīleti pātimokkhasīle. Adhicitteti lokiyasamādhibhāvanāya. Adhipaññāyāti
atk-vin02a2:197_0: Saṅkanto hotīti idhāgato hoti. Tassa satthunoti tassa titthāyatanasāmikassa. Tassa
atk-vin02a2:197_1: diṭṭhiyāti tassa santakāya laddhiyā. Idāni sāyeva laddhi yasmā tassa titthakarassa
atk-vin02a2:197_2: khamati ceva ruccati ca “idameva sacca”nti ca daḷhaggāhena gahitā; tasmā tassa khanti
atk-vin02a2:197_3: ruci ādāyoti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:197_4: Avaṇṇe bhaññamāneti garahāya bhaññamānāya. Anabhiraddhoti aparipuṇṇasaṅkappo; no
atk-vin02a2:197_5: paggahitacitto. Udaggoti abbhunnatakāyacitto. Idaṃ bhikkhave saṅghātanikaṃ aññatitthiyapubbassa
atk-vin02a2:197_6: anārādhanīyasminti bhikkhave yamidaṃ tassa satthuno tasseva ca laddhiyā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne
atk-vin02a2:197_7: “kiṃ ime paraṃ garahantī”ti kāyavacīvikāranibbattakaṃ anattamanattaṃ, buddhādīnañca
atk-vin02a2:197_8: avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanattaṃ, yañca tasseva satthuno tasseva ca laddhiyā vaṇṇe
atk-vin02a2:197_9: bhaññamāne attamanattaṃ, buddhādīnañca vaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanattaṃ, idaṃ aññatitthiyapubbassa
atk-vin02a2:197_10: anārādhanīyasmiṃ saṅghātanikaṃ, anārādhake parivāsavattaṃ apūrake kamme idaṃ liṅgaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:197_11: idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, idamacalappamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ anārādhako kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo
atk-vin02a2:197_12: āgato na upasampādetabboti ito ekenapi aṅgena samannāgato na upasampādetabbo. Sukkapakkhe
atk-vin02a2:198_0: Evaṃ ārādhako kho bhikkhaveti evaṃ nātikālena gāmappavesanā nātidivā paṭikkamanaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:198_1: na vesiyādigocaratā, sabrahmacārīnaṃ kiccesu dakkhatādi, uddesādīsu tibbacchandatā,
atk-vin02a2:198_2: titthiyānaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, titthiyānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:198_3: vaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatāti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-vin02a2:198_4: titthiyavattānaṃ paripūraṇena ārādhako paritosako bhikkhūnaṃ aññatitthiyapubbo āgato upasampādetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:199_0: Sace pana upasampadamāḷakepi ekaṃ vattaṃ bhindati, puna cattāro māse parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:199_1: Yathā pana bhinnasikkhāya sikkhamānāya puna sikkhāpadāni ca sikkhāsammuti ca diyyati,
atk-vin02a2:199_2: evaṃ nayimassa kiñci puna dātabbamatthi. Pubbe dinnaparivāsoyeva hi tassa parivāso.
atk-vin02a2:199_3: Tasmā puna cattāro māse parivasitabbaṃ. Sace parivasanto antarā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-vin02a2:199_4: nibbatteti, lokiyadhammo nāma kuppanasabhāvo, na upasampādetabbo. Cattāro māse pūritavattova
atk-vin02a2:199_5: upasampādetabbo. Sace pana parivasanto cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggaṇhati, upādārūpāni
atk-vin02a2:199_6: paricchindati, nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti, tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ ārabhati,
atk-vin02a2:199_7: lokiyadhammo nāma kuppanasabhāvo, neva upasampādetabbo. Sace pana vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-vin02a2:199_8: sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhati, paripuṇṇaṃyeva hoti vattaṃ. Samūhatāni sabbadiṭṭhigatāni
atk-vin02a2:199_9: abbuḷhaṃ vicikicchāsallaṃ taṃdivasameva upasampādetabbo. Sacepi titthiyaliṅge ṭhito
atk-vin02a2:199_10: sotāpanno hoti, parivāsakiccaṃ natthi, tadaheva pabbājetvā upasampādetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:200_0: Upajjhāyamūlakaṃ cīvaraṃ pariyesitabbanti upajjhāyaṃ issaraṃ katvā tassa cīvaraṃ
atk-vin02a2:200_1: pariyesitabbaṃ. Pattampi tatheva. Tasmā yadi upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ atthi, “imassa
atk-vin02a2:200_2: dehī”ti vattabbo. Atha natthi, aññe dātukāmā honti, tehipi upajjhāyasseva dātabbaṃ
atk-vin02a2:200_3: “idaṃ tumhākaṃ katvā imassa dethā”ti. Kasmā? Titthiyā nāma vilomā honti “saṅghena
atk-vin02a2:200_4: me pattacīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, kiṃ mayhaṃ tumhesu āyatta”nti vatvā ovādānusāsaniṃ na kareyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:200_5: upajjhāyena pana āyattajīvikattā tassa vacanakaro bhavissati. Tenassa “upajjhāyamūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:200_6: cīvaraṃ pariyesitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Bhaṇḍukammāyāti kesoropanatthaṃ. Bhaṇḍukammakathā parato āgamissati.
atk-vin02a2:201_0: Aggikāti aggiparicaraṇakā. Jaṭilakāti tāpasā. Ete bhikkhave kiriyavādinoti ete kiriyaṃ
atk-vin02a2:201_1: na paṭibāhanti, “atthi kammaṃ, atthi kammavipāko”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā. Sabbabuddhā hi
atk-vin02a2:201_2: nekkhammapāramiṃ pūrayamānā etadeva pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pūresuṃ, mayāpi tatheva
atk-vin02a2:201_3: pūritā, na etesaṃ sāsane pabbajjā vilomā, tasmā upasampādetabbā, na tesaṃ parivāso
atk-vin02a2:201_4: dātabboti. Imāhaṃ bhikkhave ñātīnaṃ āveṇikaṃ parihāraṃ dammīti imaṃ ahaṃ tesaṃ pāṭekkaṃ
atk-vin02a2:201_5: odissakaṃ parihāraṃ dadāmi. Kasmā evamāha? Te hi titthāyatane pabbajitāpi sāsanassa
atk-vin02a2:201_6: avaṇṇakāmā na honti, amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhassa sāsananti vaṇṇavādinova honti, tasmā evamāhāti.
atk-vin02a2:204_0: 88. Magadhesu pañca ābādhā ussannā hontīti magadhanāmake janapade manussānañca amanussānañca
atk-vin02a2:204_1: pañca rogā ussannā vuḍḍhippattā phātippattā honti. Jīvakakomārabhaccakathā cīvarakkhandhake
atk-vin02a2:204_2: āvibhavissati. Na bhikkhave pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho pabbājetabboti ye te kuṭṭhādayo
atk-vin02a2:204_3: pañca ābādhā ussannā, tehi phuṭṭho abhibhūto na pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:205_0: Tattha kuṭṭhanti rattakuṭṭhaṃ vā hotu kāḷakuṭṭhaṃ vā, yaṃkiñci kiṭibhadaddukacchuādippabhedampi
atk-vin02a2:205_1: sabbaṃ kuṭṭhamevāti vuttaṃ. Tañce nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇampi vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:205_2: na pabbājetabbo. Sace pana nivāsanapārupanehi pakatipaṭicchanne ṭhāne nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ
atk-vin02a2:205_3: avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ hoti, vaṭṭati. Mukhe pana hatthapādapiṭṭhesu vā sacepi avaḍḍhanakapakkhe
atk-vin02a2:205_4: ṭhitaṃ nakhapiṭṭhito ca khuddakatarampi, na vaṭṭatiyevāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tikicchāpetvā
atk-vin02a2:206_0: Gaṇḍoti medagaṇḍo vā hotu añño vā yo koci kolaṭṭhimattakopi ce vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhito
atk-vin02a2:206_1: gaṇḍo hoti, na pabbājetabbo. Paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pana kolaṭṭhimatte avaḍḍhanakapakkhe
atk-vin02a2:206_2: ṭhito vaṭṭati. Mukhādike appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:206_3: Tikicchāpetvā pabbājentenāpi sarīraṃ sañchaviṃ kāretvāva pabbājetabbo. Uṇṇigaṇḍā
atk-vin02a2:206_4: nāma honti gothanā viya aṅgulikā viya ca tattha tattha lambanti, etepi gaṇḍāyeva.
atk-vin02a2:206_5: Tesu sati pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Daharakāle khīrapiḷakā yobbannakāle ca mukhe kharapiḷakā
atk-vin02a2:206_6: nāma honti, mahallakakāle nassanti, na tā gaṇḍasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti, tāsu sati pabbājetuṃ
atk-vin02a2:206_7: vaṭṭati. Aññe pana sarīre kharapiḷakā nāma aparā padumakaṇṇikā nāma honti, aññā sāsapabījakā
atk-vin02a2:206_8: nāma sāsapamattā eva sakalasarīraṃ pharanti, tā sabbā kuṭṭhajātikā eva. Tāsu sati na pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:207_0: Kilāsoti na bhijjanakaṃ na paggharaṇakaṃ padumapuṇḍarīkapattavaṇṇaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, yena
atk-vin02a2:207_1: gunnaṃ viya sabalaṃ sarīraṃ hoti, tasmiṃ kuṭṭhe vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a2:207_2: Sosoti sosabyādhi; tasmiṃ sati na pabbājetabbo. Apamāroti pittummāro vā yakkhummāro
